She is taking her first loan from KADET LTD which she will use to buy a bale of second hand clothes for sale. She hopes to make enough profit which she will use to repay the loan.

Her dream is to expand her business and educate her children.

loans.use: to buy a bale of clothing.

loans.name: Berta Alicia

texts.es:
Berta, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo, esto debido a la necesidad de continuar invirtiendo en el negocio, para no descuidarse y seguir progresando, ella comprara un número de pollos pequeños para la granja.
Este préstamo al igual que el anterior, espera que le ayude a mejorar la granja, satisfaciendo a los clientes, ella considera que la capacidad de la granja ha aumentado después de realizar la inversión.
texts.en:
Berta has decided to access a new loan because she needs to continue investing in her business so that she does not neglect it and continues her progress. She will buy several small chickens for her poultry farm.

Just like her previous loan, she hopes that this will help improve her poultry farm so that she can satisfy her customers. She believes the capacity in her poultry farm will increase upon the completion of this investment.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Maria Alejandra

texts.es:
La señora Maria Alejandra es casada, tiene 38 años de edad, cursó el segundo año de primaria, tiene 1 hijos, se dedica al comercio a la venta de ropa para mujeres, inició este negocio con un poco de capital, lleva 4 años de experiencia, cuenta con el poyo de su esposo quien se dedica a la agricultura.

Solicita un préstamo para utilizarlo para la compra de mercadería, consistente en suéteres, blusas, gabachas, delantales, etc. Espera tener un negocio amplio y mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Maria Alejandra is married.  She is 38 years old and completed two years of her 'educación primária' (obligatory education for children aged 7+).  She has one child.  Maria Alejandra's business is selling ladies' clothing.  She started this business with a small amount of capital and has four years experience.  She has the support of her husband who works in agriculture.

Maria Alejandra is requesting a loan to buy merchandise (sweaters, blouses, aprons, etc.)  She hopes to expand her business and improve her income.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Irma

texts.en:
Irma is 43 years old. She is married and lives in a small village in Baghdati District with her family: husband – David, her 16 year old son, 14 year old daughter and mother in law. The children go to school. 

Irma works as an accountant in the village. She provides accountancy services to village stores. Also she is actively involved in the family agricultural business. They have a milk cow. Irma produces cheese and sells it locally. They also own a vineyard with 600 vine-trees. David makes wine and sells it in the village. Total average monthly income of the family, including monthly pension of Irma’s mother in law is 500 Laris. 

Irma requested credit for purchasing materials for house renovation. Their house is old and needs renovation. After renovation the family will live in a better house; their living conditions will improve.

loans.use: to purchase materials for house renovation

loans.name: Arely De Fátima

texts.es:
La señora Arely de Fátima es originaria del municipio de El Sauce, actualmente se desempeña como profesora de primaria en una escuela de la localidad donde tiene mucha experiencia en la docencia y de enseñarles a leer y escribir a niños siendo este trabajo lo que la apasiona debido a que de esta forma aporta al desarrollo de nuestro país.

Desde el año 2006 inició a trabajar con Ceprodel donde se le han otorgado 8 créditos para mejora de su vivienda ya que se ha visto beneficiada porque dichos créditos le han ayudado en su desarrollo económico porque brinda mejores condiciones de vida a sus dos hijos.

Como madre responsable quiere darles la mejor preparación a sus hijos profesionalmente para que sean personas de bien, trabajadoras y que se defiendan en el futuro. Por tal razón , el crédito que ahora está solicitando será para cubrir gastos universitarios de uno de sus hijos el cual ingresará muy pronto a su carrera profesional y se siente muy feliz porque al fin verá cumplidos sus sueños de tener un hijo universitario que pronto llegará a ser un gran profesional.

Espera con mucha seguridad el crédito que le permitirá realizar los gastos universitarios de su hijo que tanto lo requiere.
texts.en:
Arely de Fátima is from the town of El Sauce and currently is working as an elementary school teacher in a local school.  She has quite a bit of teaching experience and teaching children to read and write is her passion because she contributes to the development of our country this way.

She started working with Ceprodel in 2006 and has been granted 8 home improvement loans.  Said loans have benefitted her because they’ve helped her economic development since they provide better living conditions for her two children.

Like every responsible mother, she wants to provide her children with professional training so that they will become upstanding, hardworking citizens who can fend for themselves in the futures.  For this reason, the loan she’s now requesting will be to cover university costs for one of her sons who will soon start his professional career.  

She feels very happy because at last her dream of having a son in university who will soon become a professional will come true.  She’s confidently waiting for the loan that will allow her to pay for her son’s required university expenses.

loans.use: to pay university costs.

loans.name: Luisa Guadalupe

texts.es:
Luisa de oficio comerciante, venden ropa usada en la ciudad de León, tiene 24 años de edad, además de dedicar a vender, estudiante del segundo año de la carrera de Ingeniería en Sistema, con lo que ella gana por la venta de ropa usada es que paga su carrera. Su madre le enseño a trabajar en esta actividad, quien lleva 30  años dedicándose a la venta de mercadería en general. Desde los 14 años Luisa acompañaba a su madre a comprar productos en Honduras para vender en Nicaragua  donde juntas se iban a vender a los pueblos de León. Su mama le ayudo a poner este negocio de venta de ropa usada el cual tiene 1 año y 6 meses de tenerlo. 
Ella realizo el crédito para comprar ropa usada. Al surtir su mercadería  de diferentes estilos y tallas le ayuda a vender, ganar mejores ingresos al ofrecer variedad. Para ella su principal meta es culminar su carrera y hacer crecer su tienda de ropa usada, acondicionarlo tenerlo con vitrinas, estantes , maniquíes pero todo lo quiere ir lográndolo poco a poco.
texts.en:
Luisa, a storekeeper by trade, sells used clothing in the city of León.  She is 24 years old.  In addition to working in sales she is in the second year of her degree program in systems engineering.  She pays for her program with what she earns selling used clothes.

Her mother, who has worked selling general merchandise for 30 years, taught her to work in this job.  Since she was 14 Luisa would go with her mother to Honduras to buy products to sell in Nicaragua where together they would go to sell to the towns of León.  Her mother helped her set up her business selling used clothing, which she has had for a year and a half.

She got the loan to buy used clothing.  Supplying her merchandise with different styles and sizes helps her to sell and earn better income by offering variety.  Her main goal is to finish her degree program and to make her used-clothing store grow, to renovate it to have display cases, shelves, and mannequins, but she wants to do it little by little.

loans.use: to buy used clothing.

loans.name: Pamella

texts.en:
Pamella is a 41 year old, widowed lady from Vihiga County, West of Kenya. She is mother to 4 children who are under her care.

Pamella runs a nursery school, a business she has run for the last 3 years, making a monthly income of Kes 7,000. She is taking a second loan from KADET LTD which she will use to expand classrooms and buy learning materials for the school. 

Her profits will be used to expand the school and also provide for her family’s basic needs.Her dream is to grow her profits through funding from KADET LTD.

loans.use: to expand classrooms for the nursery school.

loans.name: Victor Julio

texts.es:
Víctor Julio  es un señor de 47 años de edad que vive con su esposa  y su familia en una comunidad llamada Cimarrón de Santa Teresita de Turrialba, en la provincia de Cartago. Es una pequeña comunidad rural de aproximadamente dos mil habitantes. Sus pobladores se dedican a la producción de leche y la agricultura. Tiene un relieve irregular y mucho del terreno se mantiene como bosque tropical húmedo. Cimarrón se localiza aproximadamente a hora y media en bus de Turrialba, el centro de comercio más cercano. Sin embargo, varias veces al año el camino se vuelve intransitable por las lluvias.

Desde hace algunos años Víctor Julio ha querido mejorar su lechería, el cuenta en estos momentos con el local para llevar a cabo su actividad, pero le falta lo principal para que su negocio surja, su propósito es vender sus productos a los vecinos de su comunidad. El proyecto le es muy interesante y beneficioso.

Actualmente Víctor Julio está solicitando un micro crédito de ¢500.000 quinientos mil colones) para la compra de una vaca lechera, ya que se dedica a la venta de lácteos especialmente quesos. Con esto el espera hacer crecer su negocio y mejorar tanto su calidad de vida como la de su familia. 

Víctor Julio es socio de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal Nuevas Esperanzas para Cimarrón, una de las 150 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica. Este será su primer préstamo y con él espera continuar creciendo a nivel personal y fortalecerse económicamente, además de participar activamente en la organización de crédito en su comunidad.
texts.en:
Victor Julio, 47, lives with his wife and family in a community called Cimarrón de Santa Teresita de Turrialba in Cartago Province.  It is a small, rural community with about 2000 inhabitants.  Its residents are milk producers and farmers.  It has an irregular terrain and much of the land is a tropical, humid forest.  Cimarrón is about an hour and a half bus ride from Turrialba, the nearest commercial center.  However, several times during the year the road becomes impassable due to the rains.

Victor has wanted to improve his dairy farm for several years.  He currently has a locale to carry out his activities but he lacks the main things needed for his business to surge ahead.  His goal is to sell his products among his neighbors in the community.  The project is very interesting and beneficial for him.

Currently Victor is asking for a ¢500.000 (five-hundred thousand colones) micro loan to buy a dairy cow since he sells dairy products, especially cheese.  With this he expects to make his business grow and improve his and his family’s quality of life.

Victor Julio is a member of the “Nuevas Esperanzas para Cimarrón” (New Hopes for Cimarrón) communal bank, one of EDESA’s 150 social organizations in Costa Rica.  This will be his first loan and he hopes to continue growing personally and becoming stronger economically in addition to participating actively in his community’s credit organization.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Maritza Magda

texts.es:
Doña Maritza, continua con su negocio de venta de anteojos y carcasas de celulares entre otros productos, en donde ha aumentado sus ventas al vender variedad. Lo que, lo ha logrado al trabajar con mas capital, atraves del financiamiento, todos invertido en comercio. Su ventas las hace fuera de un centro comercial en un lugar fijo de vender sus productos, no tiene kiosko, lo hace de forma ambulante, solo que tiene su espacio.
Hoy con este nuevo prestamo, podra hacer mejora en su casa, al terminar la pared de concreto en la parte de enfrente, asi como hacer divisiones internas, logrando seguridad, comodidad para su familia, y un techo digno, que junto a su esposo siguen logrando estas mejoras al apoyarse mutuamente.
texts.en:
Ms. Mariza continues with her business selling eyeglasses and cell phone cases among other items. She has expanded sales due to a more varied inventory, which resulted from working with the capital from an earlier loan that was invested entirely in her business.

She sells her products outside of a shopping center in a fixed place. She does not have a kiosk but is a street vender, selling within an allotted area.

Today with this new loan she will be able to make improvements on her house. She will finish the concrete wall at the front as well as create separate rooms, thereby acquiring security, comfort for her family and a decent roof. She and her husband continue making these improvements through mutual support.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to build a concrete wall at the front of her house.

loans.name: María Herculana

texts.es:
María, solicita un nuevo préstamo para fortalecer el negocio, comprara materiales para la jarcia: lazos de diferentes medidas y colores, con ellos elaborara los productos derivados, para ofrecer a los clientes, ella considera que el préstamo anterior le ayudo muchísimo, pues surtió el negocio y mejoraron sus ventas.
La condición familiar de María ha sido mucho mejor, se mantienen siempre unidos, trabajando,  esforzándose por salir adelante.
texts.en: María is requesting another loan to strengthen her business. She’d like to buy materials to make rope, like ribbons of different colors and sizes, which she elaborates to make by-products to sell to her clients. She considers her that her previous loan really helped her as she was able to stock up her business and improve her sales. Her family life has improved a lot as they’re united, working, and making the effort to get ahead.

loans.use: buy ribbon and pita fiber to make rope.

loans.name: Serapio

texts.es:
Serapio, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para la recolección de los cultivos de caña de azúcar y de café, con el dinero de este crédito pagara mozos para que le ayuden a procesar la cosecha y poder finalizar con el cultivo.
Él ha tenido una experiencia positiva con el préstamo anterior, y ejemplo de ello es que estará recolectando la cosecha, esto significa que su esfuerzo esta recompensado con los frutos que recolectara y serán de ayuda para toda su familia.
texts.en:
Serapio is asking for a new loan to harvest his sugar cane and coffee crops.  He will use the money from the loan to hire laborers to help him process his harvest and finish up with his crops.

He had a positive experience with his previous loan, which is demonstrated by the fact that he will be harvesting his crop.  This shows that his effort is being repaid with the produce he will harvest, which will help his whole family.

loans.use: to pay laborers to harvest his crops

loans.name: Maria Vilma

texts.es:
María, después de su experiencia con el préstamo, se ha decidido a continuar trabajando con esta institución, invirtiendo un nuevo préstamo en la compra de mercadería y productos para el chalet, como gaseosas, galletas, jugos, boquitas, refrescos, y para la elaboración de pupusas, ya que está por iniciar la temporada escolar y atenderá nuevamente el chalet.
Ella considera que el préstamo anterior le ayudo para mejorar el negocio, incrementando los productos de la venta, esto la ha motivado a seguir en el negocio y contar con la ayuda de los prestamos.
texts.en:
Following her experience with her previous loan, María has decided to continue working with our institution.  She will invest her new loan in buying merchandise and products for her food stall, such as soda, cookies, juice, snacks, soft drinks and ingredients for making pupusas.  The school term is about to start and she will once more work on her food stall. 

María believes that her previous loan helped her to improve her business, increasing the products she has to sell.  This has encouraged her to continue working in her business and rely on the help of loans.

loans.use: to buy soda, cookies, juice, snacks and soft drinks

loans.name: Aida

texts.es: La señora Aida es cliente antiguo de emprender se dedica al comercio de productos de uso personal y de higiene personal como ser: detergentes, papel higiénico, toallas higiénicas, jabón de lavar ropa, jaboncillo  entre otros los cuales distribuye por mayor  a sus diferentes clientes, vive en la zona noreste de la cuidad de Cochabamba, su esposo es asalariado, tiene 2 hijos los cuales se encuentran estudiando, la señora indica que el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de mercadería por mayor, como jaboncillos y papel higiénico esta es la única actividad con la que generara ingresos para sustentar su familia, es una persona muy trabajadora se siente agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado ya que esto le permite crecer en su negocio y de esta manera mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Aida is an existing client of Emprender.  Her business is selling personal products and toiletries such as detergents, toilet paper, sanitary towels, washing powder, soap, etc.  She distributes these products wholesale to her different customers.  Aida lives in the north-east area of the city of Cochabamba.  Her husband is a wage earner.  The couple have two children who are in school.  Aida says that she will invest her loan in buying merchandise such as soap and toilet paper wholesale.  This is the only income-generating business she has with which to support her family.  Aida is a very hard-working person who feels grateful to the institution for the support she has received from them.  It allows her to grow in her business and thereby improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as soap and toilet paper

loans.name: Moses

texts.en:
Moses is a 43 years old man from Kisumu city within the western part of Kenya and is married to Grace. They have 4 children 15, 12, 4, and 1 years old respectively. 

He has been selling assorted fruit salads for the last 7 years and makes a profit of KES. 21,000 per month. He is taking his first loan from KADET LTD which he will use to purchase a fruit blender and grinder. He will use the anticipated profit to expand his business into a large venture and open a hotel.

His dream is to make enough profits to grow his business and also meet his family needs.

loans.use: to buy a fruit blender and grinder.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en: Margaret is 50 years old, married with 2 children. She runs a retail shop to earn a living, and has been in the business for 7 years. She describes her business environment as busy because many customers visit her daily. Since she joined Faulu Kenya she has been able to save her income and hopes to expand her business in the future. She has applied for 20,000 Kenya Shillings to buy milk,soap and rice to sell.

loans.use: to buy milk, soap and rice to sell

loans.name: Malika

texts.ru: Малика замужем и любящая мать четверых детей. Муж является экономистом. Она очень трудолюбивая и целеустремленная женщина. Более 10 лет она занимается купле- продажей сухофруктов. Она имеет большой абрикосовый сад, и там растут 100 штук деревьев абрикоса. Каждый сезон получает хороший урожай.  От полученной прибыли провела свадьбу сына. Малика хотела бы получить займ в размере 650$ США для покупки товара и нужные средства для переработки сухофруктов.
texts.en: Malika is married and a loving mother of four children. Her husband is an economist. Malika is a very hard-working and driven woman. For over ten years she has been buying and selling dried fruits. She has a large apricot orchard with 100 trees. Every season Malika collects a good harvest. She has used her profits for her son's wedding. Malika would like to receive a loan of $650 to buy the necessary products for processing dried fruits.

loans.use: to buy things she needs for processing dried fruits

loans.name: Jaquelin Del Rosario

texts.es:
Jaquelin tiene 22 años y vive en la ciudad de Pisco, ciudad que se caracteriza por sus hermosas playas, por la pesca y su clima cálido, es madre un pequeño de 2 añitos el cual es su adoración, es amante de la comida peruana y uno de los platillos que le gusta mucho es el riquísimo “Ceviche”, en sus tiempos libres disfruta mucho de leer revistas de cosmetología pero sobre todo pasear con su pequeño, ella solo tuvo estudios secundarios, pero le hubiera gustado mucho estudiar administración de empresas.

Jaquelin tiene su negocio se salón de belleza y además venta de bebidas gaseosas y cerveza y gas domestico, trabaja alrededor de 14 horas diarias y puede atender hasta 18 clientes de manera diaria, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy creativa, honrada y sobre todo brinda una buena atención a sus clientes.
 
Jaquelin agradece mucho a los prestatarios Kiva y que gracias a su apoyo ella podrá realizar mejoras en su salón de belleza y comprar implementos para la realización de su trabajo, con ello podrá tener mayores ingresos, mejorar su calidad de vida y seguir luchando para cumplir su gran sueño:” Darle lo mejor a su hijo y Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Jaquelin, 22, lives in the city of Pisco, a city noted for its beautiful beaches, fishing and hot climate.  She’s the mother of a little two-year-old who is her love and joy.  She loves Peruvian cuisine and one of the dishes she likes best is the very delicious “Ceviche.” In her free time she very much enjoys reading cosmetology magazines but above all to go out on walks with her little one.  She only completed secondary school but would have liked to study Business Administration very much.

Jaquelin has a beauty salon and also sells soft-drinks, beer and gas for domestic use.  She works about 14 hours a day and can take care of up to 18 customers daily.  She believes that she does well in her business because she’s very creative, honest and above all provides good customer service.

Jaquelin is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to their support she’ll be able to do some improvements in her beauty salon and buy some tools she needs for work.  With that, she’ll earn higher income, improve her quality of life and continue striving to reach her great dream: “To give the best to her son and have a house of her own.”

loans.use: to buy tools and make improvements to her salon.

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es:
Juan, necesita invertir en el negocio, comprando más productos medicinales para ofrecer en el negocio, por esta razón está solicitando este préstamo para realizar la compra de productos naturales curativos, tratamientos alimenticios, dietéticos entre otros.
Él considera que ha mejorado su situación con el negocio, aumentaron los clientes y mejoraron las ventas.
texts.en:
Juan needs to invest in his business. He’d like to buy more medicinal products to offer in his business. For this reason, he’s requesting a loan so he can buy natural curative products, nutritional treatments and diet products, among others. 
He considers that he has improved his situation at work, as both his clientele and sales have increased.

loans.use: buy natural curative products, nutritional treatments and diet products.

loans.name: Claudia Lisseth

texts.es: Claudia, necesita comprar mercadería para elaborar bisutería y afiches, ella comprara pulseras, aretes, collares, poster, llaveros, toda esta mercadería para ofrecer a los clientes. Claudia esta con la disposición de trabajar bien con el préstamo, pues considera que son muy útiles para fortalecer el negocio y mejorar económicamente.
texts.en: Claudia needs to buy merchandise to make costume jewelry and posters,  She will buy bracelets, earrings, necklaces, posters, and key rings.  All of this merchandise is to offer to her customers.  Claudia is prepared to work well with her loan because she considers it very useful for strengthening her business and improving her finances.

loans.use: to buy bracelets, earrings, necklaces, posters, and key rings

loans.name: Taladaneh Group

texts.en:
In the photo above are members of the “Taladaneh” group. They are small scale businesswomen based in Lunsar, a town in northern Sierra Leone. This is the first loan these entrepreneurs are accessing from SMT/Kiva lenders. With this loan, they will be able to expand their businesses, make more profit and consequently improve on their standard of living. 

The leader of this group is Isatu. Isatu is age 50; she was born in Lunsar town where she is currently residing together with her husband and 4 children. Her husband is a carpenter and her children are attending primary and secondary schools respectively. For 10 years now, Isatu has been selling market food – rice, onions, pepper, flour, sugar, palm-oil, etc. With her share of this loan, she is going to buy the above mentioned items in bulk to add to her business.

loans.use: to buy rice, onions, pepper, flour, sugar, palm-oil, etc. in bulk to add to her business

loans.name: Yowanina

texts.en:
Yowanina aged 40 years old, is a married woman living in a permanent house in Kyenjojo, Uganda.

She grows maize and groundnuts for commercial purposes and has done it for 15 years.She dreams of building a permanent residential house.Yowanina wants a loan to buy maize and ground nuts for planting.

loans.use: to buy maize and ground nuts for planting.

loans.name: Evelyn Del Pilar

texts.es:
Evelyn es profesora de educación, ella se dedica a esta labor todas las mañanas. Su interés en esta labor traspasa sus horarios educativos, es por eso que decidió abrir un pequeño negocio, en donde se dedica a la venta de libros, folletos, coquitos, los mismos que son empleados en el avance educativo de los niños y adolescentes peruanos. Aprendió de este negocio debido a que cuando inicia el periodo escolar, detectaba la necesidad que tenian los padres de familia, es por esto que decidió incursioonar en este negocio y esta muy feliz por los resultados obtenidos.

Evelyn es una mujer que disfruta mucho del “Pollo a la brasa”, plato popular en el Perú, es consumido usualmente los fines de semana como un aperitivo en las noches. Actualmente Evelyn se dedica a esta labor aproximadamente desde hace 12 años y atiende en promedio a 20 clientes diarios, lo que le permite tener un ingresos de S/.30.00 aproximadamente.

Con ayuda de los prestatarios Kiva, Evelyn podrá comprar más libros y coquitos, que son actualmente los elementos que necesita para vender por temporada escolar, este apoyo la ayudará a continuar saliendo adelante y mejorar continuamente su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Evelyn is an Education teacher; she works at this every morning but her interest in this work goes beyond the work day which is why she decided to open a small business where she sells books, pamphlets, “Coquitos” [series of children’s literature] which are used to advance the education of Peruvian children and adolescents.  She learned this business because when the school term started she noticed the need parents had so she decided to go into this business and she’s very happy with the results she’s obtained.

Evelyn is someone who very much enjoys “Pollo a la Brasa,” a popular dish in Perú that’s consumed usually on weekends as an evening snack.  

Evelyn has been in this line of work for 12 years and tends to about 20 customers daily which means an income of about 30 soles approximately.

With help from Kiva lenders Evelyn will be able to buy more books and Coquitos which are the elements she currently needs to sell during the school term.  This support will help her continue getting ahead and continuously improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy educational books.

loans.name: Rosemary

texts.en:
Rosemary is 34 years old, divorced, and has five children. She lives in the western part of Kenya. Rosemary sells sausages, which she has been doing for two years. She earns a monthly income of 15,000 KES. 

Rosemary is requesting her first loan from KADET LTD, which she will use to buy a stock of sausages. She will use the anticipated  profit to buy a plot of land for her family. Rosemary desires to build a big business empire and build a home for her children.

loans.use: to purchase sausages.

loans.name: Khetam

texts.en:
Khetam is a 41-year-old married woman from Al Nasser, Amman, Jordan and a mother of four children.

Khetam is a tailor and she is requesting a loan of 400 JD to purchase fabrics with an aspiration of opening a shop.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics.

loans.name: Fatimah

texts.en:
Due to cultural issues Fatimah was not willing to have her picture uploaded on the internet, so the man in the photo is her son, Iyad.

Fatimah is a 43-year-old married woman from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan and a mother of four children.

Fatimah is requesting a loan of 700 JD to do maintenance on her home with an aspiration of improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to do maintenance for her home.

loans.name: Julia Rosario

texts.es:
La señora Julia Rosario es casada, tiene 41 años de edad, cursó los grados de educacion primaria, tiene 5 hijos 4 de los cuales estudian, se dedica al tricotado de hilos, lleva 4 años de experiencia en este trabajo, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien la apoya económicamente.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para invertirlo en la compra de terreno, ya que quiere tener una lugar como propiedad y así mejorar su condición de vida, espera seguir trabajando, apoyando a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Señora Julia Rosario is married and 41 years old. She accomplished elementary education and is the mother of five children, with four of whom attending school. Julia Rosario knits threads and has a four-year-long experience in this activity. She relies on the help of her husband who supports her financially.

Julia Rosario applies for a loan which she will use to buy a plot of land, because she wants to be the owner of her home and thus improve her living conditions. She hopes to continue working and supporting her children.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land.

loans.name: Zhuzhuna

texts.en:
Zhuzhuna is from the village of Rokhi, West Georgia. She is 29 years old, married, and lives with her family: her husband Mirza, three children (8, 6 and 3 years old) and her mother-in-law. The children go to school. 

Mirza is a worker constructor. Also he owns a tractor and works in the village as a tractor driver. In season, he provides seasonal (tilling, moving, sowing) services to neighbor farmers. 

Zhuzhuna is leading the family agricultural activities. They have a milk cow and sell home-made cheese on the local market. Also the family owns 1.2 hectares of land, on a part of which maize is grown. Harvested maize is also sold locally. The total average monthly income of the family, including Zhuzhuna’s mother-in-law's pension is 550 Laris.

Zhuzhuna requested a loan to fix Mirza’s tractor, as it is old and has been out of order for a  couple of months. After some parts are changed, it will be ready for spring seasonal agricultural work. Mirza will still be able to use his tractor for income generation.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for a tractor.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en: Samuel is 23 years old, and he runs a car transport business to earn a living. He has been in the business for two years and has employed one person. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to improve his living standards and hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 30,000 Kenya Shillings to buy new tires for his car.

loans.use: To buy new tires for his car.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en: Francis, aged 33, is a married man living in a semi-permanent house in Kyenjojo, Uganda. He has owned a banana plantation for seven years now. He dreams of building a permanent residential house and expanding his own plantation. Francis wants a loan to buy manure for mulching his banana plantation.

loans.use: to buy manure  for mulching his banana plantation.

loans.name: Joice

texts.en:
Joice is a forty-year-old lady from Homabay County and is married to Noah. They have five children aged two to 14 years.

Joice operates a second-hand clothes selling business, a business she has done for the last three years, making a monthly income of KES. 6,000. She is taking her first loan from KADET LTD which she will use to buy bales of second-hand clothes for resale. 


Her profits will be used to educate her children. Her dream is to grow her profits so that she can meet her family’s needs fully.

loans.use: To buy bales of  used clothes  for sale.

loans.name: Kenneth

texts.en: Thirty-one-year-old Kenneth would like a loan to buy cosmetics for his salon. He started the salon with his personal savings. He intends to put up a residential house and buy a motorcycle to add to his income sources.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Enrique Faustino

texts.es:
El señor Enrique Faustino es casado, tiene 40 años de edad, realizo sus estudios de educación primaria, tiene 5 hijos 3 de los cuales están estudiando, se dedica a la tejeduría de cortes típicos y al tricotado de hilos, tiene 12 años de experiencia en este negocio.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para invertirlo, en la compra de hilo blanco y tinte, como también hilos de color, y así mejorar su producción de tejidos.
texts.en:
Señor Enrique Faustino is married and 40 years old. He accomplished elementary education and is the father of five children, with three of whom attending school. Enrique Faustino weaves traditional fabrics and knits thread. He has a 12-year-long experience in this activity.

Enrique Faustino applies for a loan which he will use to buy white yarn, dye and also colored yarn, and thus improve his production of fabrics.

loans.use: to buy yarn and dye for his knitting and weaving business.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth, an 18-year-old business lady, is single but supports her parents. She has been running a beauty salon for the past year, earning a monthly income of KES 9,000.

After being introduced by an existing KADET customer, Elizabeth is applying for her first loan term with KADET LTD. to buy cosmetics and a hair dryer. She plans to expand the business with the anticipated additional profits. Elizabeth's hopes and dreams are to save and be able to continue with her education.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and a hair dryer.

loans.name: Mathilida

texts.en:
Mathilida, 54, is married to Dalmas and they have four children aged 21, 23, 17 and 14 years. Mathilida has been operating a business selling second-hand clothes, curtains, and teddy bears for the last six years, earning a monthly profit of Ksh 10,000.

Now requesting her first loan from KADET LTD., she will use the loan to purchase two bales of second-hand clothes. Mathilida, who desires to grow the business into wholesale and provide for her family, will use the anticipated profit to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to buy two bales of clothing for sale.

loans.name: Talanesu Group

texts.en:
In the photo are members of the “Talanesu” group. They are small-scale businesswomen based in Lunsar, a town in northern Sierra Leone. This is the first loan these entrepreneurs are accessing from SMT/Kiva lenders. With this loan, they will be able to expand their businesses, make more profit and consequently improve their standards of living. 

The leader of this group is Adamsay, who is pictured second from right. Adamsay is 30 years old; she was born in Makeni city but currently resides in Lunsar with her husband and three children. Her husband is a businessman. Two of her children are attending primary school, and the other is not of school-going age. For almost ten years now,  Adamsay has been selling flour, breads, oranges, rice, etc. With this loan, Adamsay is going to experiment with a different product; she is going to buy 20 barters (five gallons make a barter) of palm oil.

loans.use: to buy palm oil.

loans.name: Agatha

texts.en: Agatha, a 42-year-old mother of four children ranging in age from 6 to 14, lives in Airport, Liberia. For the past 25 years, she  has been operating a   restaurant where she enjoys serving her customers.  Now requesting a loan to purchase more pepper, rice, onions, salt, vita and coal for her business, Agatha plans to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more pepper, rice, onions, salt, vita and coal for her business

loans.name: Constance

texts.en:
Constance is 26 years old and married to Ferdinand. They have one child who is five years old. 

She sells second-hand clothes in Kakamega, a business she has done for the last three years. She earns a monthly income of 5,000 KES. This is her first loan from KADET LTD, which she will use to buy more clothes for resale. 

When she makes profits, she intends to expand her business and provide for the needs of her family. Her dream is to buy second-hand clothes and sell in bulk to other small-scale retailers.

loans.use: To buy a bale of second-hand clothing

loans.name: Pedro Pablo

texts.es:
Pedro, desea continuar trabajando con la institución, por eso está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de cerdos para la granja, ya que quiere añadir más al corral, comprara dos cerdos medianos y dos pequeños, con esta compra podrá trabajar un buen tiempo, alimentándolos para después comercializarlos.   
Él ha tenido una buena experiencia con el préstamo, el cual le ha ayudado tambien a su familia, obteniendo buenas cosechas para los gastos familiares.
texts.en:
Pedro wishes to continue working with the institution, which is why he is requesting a loan to buy pigs for the farm to add more to his pen. He will buy two medium sized and two small pigs. With this purchase, he will be able to work for a long time, feeding them and selling them later.   
He had a good experience with a previous loan, which also helped his family. He obtained good harvests with which to cover household expenses.

loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth is a 39-year-old business lady in Bamburi, Mombasa. She is single. She rents cars, a business she has successfully operated for the past five years.

This is her second loan from KADET LTD to finance her business. She plans to use the loan to purchase spare parts for her vehicles. She will use the profits to expand her business further. She hopes to excel in her business.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for her vehicles

loans.name: Levy Azucena

texts.es:
Levy, de nuevo necesita fortalecer su negocio y por eso se ha decidido a otro préstamo, debido a la necesidad de fortalecer su negocio y comprara más materiales para hacer piñatas papel, pegamento, alambre, y de esa  forma lograra aumentar en la produccion y tener variedad para sus clientes.
El préstamo anterior le ayudo porque logro mejorar sus ingresos y ayudo mucho a su familia con los gastos.
texts.en:
Levy would like to strengthen her business, so she’s decided to request another loan. To strengthen her business, she’ll buy the materials she needs to make more piñatas, like paper, glue and wire, in order to increase production and offer variety to her clients.
The previous loan she received helped increase her income, and in turn, helped her family with expenses.

loans.use: buy paper, glue and wire.

loans.name: Elias Samuel Group

texts.es:
El grupo Elias Samuel está conformado por tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras. El coordinador del grupo es don Mauricio quien se dedica desde hace 2 años al comercio de granos básicos negocio en el que invertirá el crédito. Él es casado y tiene cinco hijos de los cuales solo el menor de 19 años de edad esta con él.
Su meta es salir adelante que su negocio crezca.
Las otras integrantes son María quien tiene una pequeña y modesta pulpería desde hace tres años y Gilma se dedica al comercio de granos básicos.
texts.en:
The Elias Samuel group is made up of three enterprising and hard-working people. The group's coordinator is Don Mauricio, who has been selling staple grains for the last two years and will invest the loan in this business. He is married and has five children. Only the youngest one, who is 19 years old, still lives with him.
His goal is to get ahead and make his business grow.
The other members of the group are María, who has been running her own small and modest grocery store for the last three years, and Gilma, who sells staple grains.

loans.use: to buy staple grains.

loans.name: Halima

texts.en: Halima is a 53-year-old clothes dealer in Kilifi. She is a married mother of twelve. She has been selling clothes for the past three years. Her business is doing great. This is her third loan term with KADET LTD. She will use the loan to purchase more dresses, skirts, blouses, and trousers. She hopes to use the profits to educate her children and repay her loan. She dreams of having a family that is well cared for and has a prosperous future.

loans.use: to purchase more dresses, skirts, blouses, and trousers.

loans.name: Jaime Ricardo

texts.es:
Jaime, es un comerciante de 52 años de edad, habitante de la ciudad de León, casado, padre de 2 hijos, mayores de edad independientes. El se dedica a la venta de queso desde hace 5 años . El comenzó con este negocio vendiendo leche poco a poco   fue introduciendo queso, crema, cuajada. El vende desde su casa y también a domicilio ofreciendo su queso  fresco  y sabrosa leche. 
El solicita el crédito para compra de queso, crema y para ampliar un poco mas el negocio con el objetivo de distribuir queso  al por mayor. El tiene expectativa de convertir su venta en una distribuidora de leche y productos lácteos al por mayor y surtiendo a la gente de su comunidad de estos productos comestibles.
texts.en:
Jaime is a 52 year old merchant.  He lives in the city of León, is married and has 2 adult children.  He has been selling cheese for 5 years.  He started this business selling milk and little by little, he started introducing cheese, cream and curd.  He sells from his house and also delivers his fresh cheese and delicious milk.  

He is requesting a loan to buy cheese and cream and to expand his business a little so he can distribute his cheese wholesale.  He hopes to convert into a wholesale milk and dairy product distributor and supply the people of his community with these food products.

loans.use: purchase cheese and cream

loans.name: Issaka

texts.fr:
Issaka est un homme âgé de 43 ans. Il est marié å un/e revendeuse. Il a 03enfants, tous scolarisés . Le premier a 17 ans et le dernier a 05 ans.  
Issaka travaille comme revendeur d’huile à moteur et de frein depuis 2009. Il vend à toutes personnes dans une boutique. Sa difficulté principale est la concurrence.
Issaka a requis son quatrième crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter d’huile à moteur et de frein. Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité. 
Dans les prochaines années, Issaka voudrait développer son activité. Il dit qu’avec les profits, Il prévoit d’avoir une famille heureuse.
texts.en:
Issaka is a 43-year old man.  His wife is a vendor. He has three children, all in school. The oldest is 17 years old, and the youngest is five.

Issaka  has been working as a vendor of  engine oil and brake [fluid] since 2009. He sells to the general public out of his store. His main concern is competition. Issaka has requested his fourth loan from WAGES in order to buy  engine oil and brake fluid. He would like to reinvest in his business.

In the years to come, Issaka would like to grow his business further. He says that, with the help of his revenues, he wants to keep his family happy.

loans.use: to buy engine oil [for resale]

loans.name: Abdunura

texts.en: Abdunura is a 43-year-old married lady with eight children living in Kasese, Uganda. Her personal goal is to educate her children. She has been selling clothes for the last 16 years, after starting with only 450,000 UGX in capital. She has grown her capital to 2,900,000 UGX. Her major hardship has been inadequate capital to purchase inventory. However, she has a vision of expanding her business into new markets. Abdunura wants a loan to pay school fees.

loans.use: to pay school fees.

loans.name: Cindy Vanessa

texts.es:
Cindy, vive con su mamá, se dedica a la venta de verduras, frutas, bebidas refrescantes, este negocio se lo enseño su madre, pero que ahora ella administra, lleva 6 años de experiencia, su horario de venta es de 7:00am a 5:00pm, de lunes a domingo. 
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de pipianes, güisquiles, plátanos, cebollas, fresas, naranjas, bananas, manzanas, esta compra le ayudara para mejorar la disposición en el negocio y que sus clientes encuentren productos frescos.
Ella considera que con el buen manejo de este préstamo, estará en mejores condiciones para responder a sus obligaciones del hogar, trabajando fuertemente para mantener a su madre con lo necesario.
texts.en:
Cindy lives with her mother and sells vegetables, fruits and refreshing drinks. Her mother taught her this business and now she runs it.  She has 6 years of experience.  Her sales schedule is from 7:00 am until 5:00 pm, seven days a week.  

She is currently requesting a loan to buy squash, qüisquiles [squash family], plantains, onions, strawberries, oranges, bananas and apples.  This purchase will help her to improve her business's presentation and her customers will have fresh produce.  She says that with good loan management she will be in a better place to meet her household obligations and with hard work support her mother with what she needs.

loans.use: purchase squash, güisquiles, plantains, onions, strawberries, oranges, bananas and apples.

loans.name: Sonia Nohemi

texts.es:
Sonia, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo, para continuar brindando un buen servicio a los clientes, comprara ropa como blusas, shorts, ropa interior, para damas y caballeros, esta compra le ayudara para mantener surtido el negocio.
Ella ha tenido un efecto positivo en el negocio con el préstamo anterior, cambiando su condición para la actualidad.
texts.en: Sonia has decided to take out a new loan.  She is continuing to provide good service to her customers.  She plans to purchase clothing such as blouses, shorts, and men’s and women’s undergarments.  These purchases will help her keep her business well stocked.  Sonia’s previous loan had a positive effect on her business, and she is currently changing her situation.

loans.use: to purchase blouses, shorts, and undergarments to sell.

loans.name: Apolinario

texts.es: Apolinario, nuevamente solicita un préstamo con el objetivo de seguir trabajando en la agricultura y seguir cosechando maíz de regadillo y comprara los insumos agrícolas que necesita para que produzcan mejor: abono, semilla, fertilizantes de esa manera tendrá las cosechas más abundantes y pago de mano de obra para preparar la tierra. El préstamo anterior le ayudo porque lo utilizo para lo mismo y logro buenas cosechas el cual vendió una parte lo demás lo dejo para el gasto de su familia.
texts.en: Apolinario is requesting another loan with the goal of continuing his work in agriculture, growing irrigation corn. He’ll buy the agricultural supplies he needs to improve production, like manure, seeds and fertilizers. That way he’ll have more abundant crops and be able to pay laborers to prepare the soil. He invested his previous loan in the same things and the result was good crops, which he sold in part and the other part he kept for his family.

loans.use: buy manure, seeds, fertilizers and be able to pay laborers.

loans.name: Melania Group

texts.es:
El grupo Melania lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras. La coordinadora del grupo es Virgencia del Carmen quien es comercializa cosméticos Avon y Zermat desde hace 1 ½ años los cuales distribuye donde trabaja. Ella con el crédito pasado pudo incrementar su negocio ya que pudo comprar más productos.  
Virgencia está casada y tiene tres hijos de 3, 7 y 9 años  quienes son su motivación para salir adelante. 
Las otra integrantes son Modesta quien vende leche, leche agria y helados en su casa y en Masaya, Flor se dedica a la venta de plantas y leña.
texts.en:
The Melania group is made up of three hardworking women.  The coordinator of the group is Virgenza del Carmen, who has sold Avon and Zermat cosmetics for a year and a half, distributing them where she works.  With the last loan she was able to increase her business because she was able to buy more products.

Virgenza is married and has three children, ages 3, 7, and 9, who are her motivation for getting ahead.  The other members are Modesta, who sells milk, buttermilk, and ice cream in her home and in Masaya, and Flor, who works selling plants and firewood.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Ahrorkul

texts.ru: Ахроркул более 4 лет занимается выпечкой национальных лепёшек. Он женат и ответственный отец троих детей. Имеет свой собственный пекарни. В день он изготавливает и выпекает по 200 -250 штук лепёшек. От этого бизнеса получает хорошую прибыль. Пекарня находится в центре посёлка, имеет много своих клиентов. Кроме этого в другом месте имеет другую свою точку бизнеса. Ахроркул хотел бы получить займ в размере 3000$ США для покупки муки и уголья с целью расширения бизнеса.
texts.en: Ahrorkul has been baking traditional Tajik flatbreads for more than four years. He is married and is a responsible father of three children. He has his own bakery. He makes 200-250 flatbreads per day and receives a good profit from this business. The bakery is located in the center of the village and has many customers. Besides that he has another business location. Ahrorkul wants to get a loan in the amount of $3,000 USD to buy flour and coal with the purpose of growing his business.

loans.use: to buy flour and coal.

loans.name: Benard

texts.en:
Bernard is 28 years old and is married to Joan. He has two children, ages 4 and 2. He buys and sells potatoes, a business he has been doing for the past two years. He earns a monthly income of 100,000 KES. He has requested a loan worth 40,000 KES in order to buy more bags of potatoes. 

The anticipated profit will help him expand his business. This is his third loan. He has a dream of building his own business enterprise and raising his family's living standard.

loans.use: To purchase bags of potatoes for resale.

loans.name: Maria Carmelita

texts.es:
La  señora Maria Carmelita es casada, tiene 49 años de edad, cursó los 3 años de educación primaria, tiene 1 hijo el cual esta estudiando,se dedica a la confección de velos para novias, tiene 10 años de experiencia en este trabajo, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica a impartir clases en un establecimiento educativo.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de telas e hilos, y así aumentar la producción de este tipo de producto, espera mejora su condición de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Maria Carmelita is married and she is 49 years old. She studied three years in elementary school. She has one child who is studying. For the past 10 years she has made a living making veils for brides. She is supported by her husband who works giving classes at an educational establishment.

She has requested a loan to use to buy fabric and thread, by doing so she will be able to increase her production of this type of product. She hopes to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy raw material needed to make veils.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy goods for her grocery store.

loans.name: Manantial - 26 Group

texts.es: El Banco de Emprendimiento MANANTIAL es  banco antiguo  de la institución,  la presidenta es la Sra. Celestina es una persona muy responsable se dedica a la venta de dulces de distintas marcas al por mayor, entrega  a diferentes zonas, a diferentes tiendas ya tiene el mercado bien conformado como también clientes que le hacen pedido entrega al por mayor y al  también algunas veces por menor, con el dinero del crédito comprara dulces por mayor ya que tiene muchos pedidos que entregar, ella es casada y tiene una hijita que mantiene ya que las otros hijas son  independientes vive por la zona Pasanqueri en casa propia su esposo es chofer asalariado, y de esta manera colabora con los gastos del hogar, la Sra. Celestina es una persona muy responsable y trabajadora, se siente agradecida con la institución por el apoyo que le brinda para crecer en su negocio y de esta manera mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: The Bank Emprendimiento MANANTIAL is a long-standing institutional bank. The president is Sra. Celestina. She is a very responsible person. She sells different brands of sweets wholesale. She sells in different areas and to different stores, as she has her regular clients. She also has clients who place wholesale and retail orders. With the loan, she will buy wholesale sweets as she has a lot of orders to fill. She’s married and has one daughter that is under her care, the other daughters are independent. She lives near Pasanqueri in her own home. Her husband is a salaried chauffeur and helps with the household expenses. Sra. Celestina is a very responsible and hard-working person. She is grateful to the institution for the support she has received in growing her business, and improving her quality of life.

loans.use: buy wholesale sweets.

loans.name: Berta Lidia

texts.es:
Berta Lidia, tiene 32 años de edad, vive con su esposo en la colonia San Juan Bosco de Cofradía, cortes, tiene 2 hijos de 2 y 1 años de edad.
Berta Lidia se dedica a la costura. Inicio hace 2 años con su propio capital, especializándose  en la elaboración de ropa de cama, forros de muebles y prendas de vestir, no se le dificulto iniciar esta actividad ya que obtuvo la experiencia por su trabajo anterior qué fue en una  maquila como operaria de maquina. EL  negocio le ha ayudado mucho a mejorar sus ingresos de los cuales a podido reinvertir en el mismo.  Ella dedica 6 horas diarias.
Actualmente ha decidido solicitar su primer préstamo de 6,000 lempiras para poder abastecerse de materiales (telas), para la elaboración de ropa de cama, forros de mueble y ropa de vestir unisex.
Su meta es comprar una maquina mas para el taller, y así poder atender con mayor rapidez el servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Berta Lidia, age 32, lives with her husband in the San Juan Bosco neighborhood of Cofradía, Cortes.  She has two children, ages two and one.

Berta Lidia is a seamstress.  She started her business with her own capital two years ago.  She specializes in making bedding, furniture covers, and clothing.  It was not difficult for her to start this business activity.  She had experience from a previous job where she worked as a machine operator in a factory.  The business has helped her lot to improve her income, and she has been able to reinvest in the business.  She works six hours a day.

She has now decided to request her first loan for 6,000 lempiras to be able to stock up on fabrics.  She will use the fabrics to make bedding, furniture covers, and unisex clothes.

Her goal is to buy one more machine for her shop.  This way she will be able to provide her customers with more rapid service.

loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: Las Mañanitas Group

texts.es:
El grupo las Mañanitas está conformado por tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es María Elena de 41 años la cual se dedica al comercio de ropa por más de 5 años y los fines de semana realiza fritanga, restaurante popular que consiste en comida frita. Ella es casada y tiene tres hijos pero solo la menor esta con ella.
Ella con los créditos aumentado sus negocios y ganancias con las cuales ha podido condicionar su casa como fue la  realización de  un anexo.
Las otras integrantes son Ángela quien vende tortillas, frijoles y enchiladas de todo un poco y Sorayda de 23 años se dedica al comercio de zapatos y sandalias desde hace 3 años.
texts.en:
Las Mañanitas Group is made up of three hardworking and entrepreneurial people, one of whom is María Elena, 41, who has worked selling clothing for more than five years.  On the weekend she has a "fritanga," a popular restaurant that makes fried food.  She is married and has three children, but only the youngest lives with her.

With the loans she has increased her business and profits, with which she has been able to renovate her house, such making an addition.

The other members are Ángela, who sells a little each of tortillas, beans, and enchiladas, and Soraya, 23, who has worked selling shoes and sandals for three years.

loans.use: to buy merchandise in clothing and basic necessities.

loans.name: Martha Lorena

texts.es:
Martha , tiene un pequeño Kiosko donde vende reposterías y dulces típicos de la ciudad tales como cajetas de leche y bizcotelas, es madres de 5 hijos, viuda. Inicio su negocio hace 5 años, este ha sido su segundo negocio antes vendía ropa y mercadería en general. Actualmente tiene su kiosko frente a un colegio ubicado en uno de los barrios mas populares y pintorescos de la ciudad de León , llamado Subtiava .
Ella realiza sus propias reposterías (Pan Dulce)  pero paga para hornear porque no tiene horno, es por tal motivo que esta solicitando el crédito para construir un pequeño horno artesanal  para hornear sus reposterías y ahorrarse ese costo del alquiler de horno pues desea ampliar mas su  kiosko y vender de todo tipo de alimentos pero por el momento quiere comenzar con a venta de repostería y dulces típicos.
texts.en:
Martha has a small kiosk where she sells pastries and traditional sweets of the city like 'cajetas de leche' (similar to caramel) and 'bizcotelas' (small crisp cookies). She has 5 children and is a widow. She started her business five years ago; this is her second business, before she sold clothing and general merchandise. 

Presently she has her kiosk across from a college located in one of the most popular and picturesque neighborhoods in the city of Leon, called Subtiava. She makes her own sweet bread, but she pays to use an oven because she doesn't have her own. It is for this motive that she has requested a loan, so that she can make a small artisanal oven. This way she will  be able to bake her own breads and save the money she has been spending on renting an oven. She would like to enlarge her kiosk and sell all kinds of foods, but for right now she wants to start with selling sweet breads and traditional sweets.

loans.use: to build a small artisanal oven

loans.name: Hector Arely

texts.es:
Héctor, está solicitando nuevamente un préstamo para invertirlo en sus actividades agrícolas, como la compra de abono, además pagara una maquina desgranadora para finalizar el proceso  con el cultivo anterior, desgranando toda la cosecha de maíz, él manifiesta que fue muy provechoso el anterior préstamo, y que gracias Dios tuvo buenos frutos.
La condición de Héctor se mantiene, su familia se encuentra bien y hasta el momento no ha pasado ninguna dificultad.
texts.en: Hector is requesting a loan again to invest in his agricultural activities, like buying fertilizer and to pay for a threshing machine to finish the process with his previous crop, to remove the grains from the corn. He states that the last loan was very helpful and that he thanks God for his good crops. Hector continues to remain in good health, his family is well and up to now they have not had any difficulties.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pay for a threshing machine.

loans.name: Cecelia

texts.en:
Cecelia is 41 years old and lives in Airport community. She has four children between 7 to 26 years old. One is in college, working and living on their own, while the three younger ones are in school and live at home. Cecelia’s husband is a businessman. 

For the past fifteen years she has been selling red oil (palm oil) in the market. She is requesting a loan to purchase more red oil for her business. Her plans are to build her house and send her younger children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more red oil (palm oil) for her business.

loans.name: Gladis Herminia

texts.es:
Gladis, se encuentra solicitando nuevamente un préstamo para la compra de prendas de vestir nuevas, para fortalecerse y mejorar la atención a los clientes, su compra será en blusas, faldas, pantalones, ropa interior.
Ella manifiesta que el préstamo le permitió crecer y tener mejores prendas de vestir, que le ocasionaron mejores ventas, con lo que tambien ha ayudado a su familia.
texts.en:
Gladis is again requesting a loan to buy new clothing, grow stronger, and improve service to her customers.  She will purchase blouses, skirts, pants, and underwear.

She says that the loan allowed her to grow and have better articles of clothing, and that it brought about better sales, which also has helped her family.

loans.use: to buy blouses, skirts, pants, and underwear.

loans.name: Seily Ivonett

texts.es: La señora Seily es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora quien tiene una comideria negocio que inicio hace 8 años cuenta con 6 trabajadores y su meta es tener un restaurante con las condiciones adecuadas. Ella invertirá en mobiliario para el negocio mesas, sillas…etc ya que desea ampliarlo y mejorar los que tenía.
texts.en: Ms. Seily is a hardworking and enterprising woman who has owned an eatery for 8 years. She employs 6 workers, and her goal is to open up a restaurant with all the necessary amenities. She will invest the loan in purchasing furnishings like tables, chairs, etc. for the business because she needs to expand and improve what she already has.

loans.use: to purchase furniture for her business.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is 28 years old and an enterprising businessman. He is married to Rose, a business lady. They are blessed with one child aged two years. He has been selling scrap metals for the past three years with a monthly income of KES 15,000, which he uses to support his family.

He is applying for his first loan from KADET LTD, after being introduced by an existing KADET customer. Paul will use the loan to buy scrap metals for his business. 

With the anticipated profit from the business, he will educate his child. His hopes and dreams are to buy a taxi car.

loans.use: to buy scrap metals for his business.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter, a 50-year-old father of two, is married to Rosemary, a business lady. For the past two years Peter has been running a spare part shop, earning a monthly income of KES 26,000 which he uses to support his family.

Now applying for his first loan from KADET LTD. after being introduced by an existing KADET customer, he will use it to buy more spare parts for his shop, and with the anticipated profit will educate his children. Peter's hope is to buy a taxi, which will improve the living standard of his family.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his shop.

loans.name: Charity

texts.en:
Charity, a 38-year-old business lady, is a single mother of one child aged 12 years. She has been a charcoal dealer for the past 10 years, earning a monthly income of KES 10,500 which she uses to support her family.

Now applying for her first loan term from KADET LTD. after being introduced by an existing KADET customer, Charity will buy sacks of charcoal for resale, and will use the anticipated profit to educate her child. Charity's dream is to buy a piece of land and build a store from which to sell charcoal.

loans.use: To buy sacks of charcoal

loans.name: Dennis

texts.en:
Dennis is a 32-year-old businessman in Mombasa. He is married. He is a charcoal seller, a business he has done for the past two years with great success. 

This is his second business loan from KADET LTD to finance his business. He plans to use the loan to purchase more sacks of charcoal. He will use the anticipated profits to purchase a motorcycle to start a transportation business. 

He hopes to excel in his business.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of charcoal.

loans.name: Sixto Porfirio

texts.es:
Don Sixto Porfirio  tiene 71 años de edad, es casado hace 20 años, tiene 3 hijos de 14, 8,6 los tres están estudiando, vive en la Colonia Los Ángeles, San Pedro Sula.
Don Sixto tiene un negocio de venta de carne, específicamente carne molida la cual distribuye en los negocios del mercado local. Este negocio lo obtuvo hace 20 años con esfuerzos propios y con la ayuda de su esposa. Por la demanda de clientes a logrado mantenerse en el mercado y ha obtenido buenas ganancias con las cuales a podido suplir las necesidades diarias de sus familia. Dedicándole  8 horas diariamente.
Don Sixto solicita su primer préstamo de 22,000 lempiras para surtir el negocio con más carne molida para satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes y aumentar más sus ingresos.
Su meta es seguir trabajando para la manutención de su familia y seguir apoyando a sus hijos en sus estudios.
texts.en:
Sixto Porfirio, age 71, has been married for 20 years.  He has three children, ages 14, 8, and 6.  The three of them go to school.  He lives in the Los Ángeles neighborhood of San Pedro Sulo.

Sixto has a business of selling meat.  Specifically, he distributes ground meat to businesses at the local market.  Through his own efforts and with his wife’s help he got the business 20 years ago.  Through customer demand he has managed to stay in the market.  He has gotten good income, with which he has been able to supply his family’s necessities.  He works eight hours a day.

Sixto is requesting his first loan for 22,000 lempiras in order to stock his business with more ground meat.  He will do this in order to satisfy his customer demand and to increase his income.

His goal is to continue working to support his family and to continue supporting his children’s education.

loans.use: to buy ground meat to sell.

loans.name: Oscar Armando

texts.es: Oscar, solicita un nuevo préstamo para seguir invirtiendo en su negocio, adquiriendo materia prima para la elaboracion de pan: azúcar, harina,manteca, huevos y otros productos, que ayuden a cubrir lo que sus clientes lo solicitan más. El préstamo anterior le ayudo porque logro que sus ventas aumentaran un buen porcentaje,  el cual ayudo para que nos les faltara nada a su familia.
texts.en: Oscar is requesting a new loan so the he can continue investing in his business, obtaining the ingredients necessary to produce bread, such as sugar, flour, butter, eggs, and other products. These items will help him meet customer demand. The previous loan helped him because sales rose a good percentage, which helped his family obtain whatever they needed.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, flour, butter, and eggs.

loans.name: Rodrigo

texts.es: El señor Rodrigo es soltero pero tiene 2 hijos de 2 y 4 años el es peluquero,  abrió su peluquería hace 5 años atrás donde realiza diferentes tipos de cortes ya que vive por un lugar estratégico ya que se encuentra ubicada en lugar céntrico de la localidad de Sacaba, tiene afluencia de clientes generándole buenos ingresos diarios con el dinero del crédito comprara material e insumos para su peluquería y también como segunda actividad el señor Rodrigo tiene su banda de música donde ameniza todo tipo de acontecimientos sociales esto solo los fines de semana, el Sr Rodrigo trabaja mucho por el bienestar de sus hijos ya que el dice que es por ellos para darles un futuro mejor que se esfuerza.
texts.en:
Rodrigo is single but has two children, ages 2 and 4.  He is a hairdresser.  Five years ago he opened his beauty salon, where he does different types of cuts since he lives in a strategic location, located in a central area of the town of Sacaba.  He has an influx of customers, which generates good daily income for him.

With the loan money he will buy materials and supplies for his beauty shop.

Also, as a second job, Rodrigo has a musical band that entertains at all types of social events, only on the weekends.  Rodrigo works a lot for the well-being of his children, since he says that it is to give them a better future that he works hard.

loans.use: to buy materials and supplies for his beauty salon.

loans.name: Keziah

texts.en:
Keziah is 55 years old and a business lady. She is married to Simon, a businessman. They are blessed with two children. She has been selling second-hand clothes for the past five years with a monthly income of KES 9,000, which she uses to support her family. 

She is applying for her first loan term from KADET LTD, after being introduced by an existing KADET customer. Keziah will use the loan to buy a stock of clothes for resale.

With the anticipated profit from the business, she will educate her children. Her hopes and dreams are to open a boutique shop.

loans.use: to buy a stock of clothes for resale.

loans.name: Paris Group

texts.es:
El grupo Paris lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es María José de 23 años quien se dedica al comercio de ropa desde hace tres años. Ella  tiene dos niños uno de tres años y un recien nacido por los cuales trabaja arduamente, ella está casada y su esposo tiene  una panadería.
Las otras integrantes son Iliana de 43 años quien tiene una pulpería y Vilgen de 38 años quien vende comida desde hace 2 años.
texts.en:
The Paris Group consists of three hardworking and enterprising people. One of those people is María José, age 23, who has been in clothing sales for three years. She has two children, one of whom is 3 years old, and the other is a newborn. They are the reason for which she works arduously. She is married, and her husband owns a bakery.

The other members of the group are Iliana, age 43, who owns a general store, and Vilgen, age 38, who has been selling food for 2 years.

loans.use: to purchase apparel as merchandise.

loans.name: Adrian Gerardo

texts.es:
Adrian tiene 45 años de edad y vive con su familia en una comunidad llamada San Carlos, en la segunda provincia de Costa Rica, Alajuela. En una zona donde se ocupa el primer lugar nacional en la producción de café y azúcar de caña. Produce además granos básicos (arroz, frijoles, maíz), frutas, legumbres, tubérculos y hortalizas. Y en esta provincia está ubicado el Aeropuerto Internacional Juan Santamaría, el más importante del país.

Desde hace unos meses que Adrian necesita algún tipo de ayuda para poder comprar algunas semillas para cultivar en un terreno heredado por sus padres, ya que se le dificulta sacar adelante a sus hijos y sacar adelante su negocio. 

Es por eso que Adrian está solicitando un préstamo por el monto de ¢600,000.00 (seiscientos mil colones) esto para comprar semillas para lograr cultivar piña, y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. También desea comprar varios insumos para el mantenimiento  de este fruto, asi como fertilizantes y abonos para una excelente cosecha del mismo. 

Adrian es socia de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal de El Encanto de Pital y es su primer préstamo, en una de las 150 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica. Continuara creciendo a nivel personal y económico además de participar activamente en la organización de crédito en su comunidad.
texts.en:
Adrian is 45 years old and lives with his family in a community called San Carlos in the second province of Costa Rica, Alajuela. The area is first in the nation for the production of coffee and sugar cane. In addition, basic staples such as rice, beans and corn are produced along with fruits, legumes, tubers and garden vegetables. And the Juan Santamaría International Airport is located in this province, the country's most important. 

For a number of months now Adrian has needed some type of help in order to buy some seeds to grow on land inherited by his parents, since he is having difficulties getting his children and his business ahead. 

Thus Adrian is requesting a loan in the amount of ¢600,000.00 (600 thousand colones) for purchasing seeds in order to grow pineapple, and give his family a better quality of life. He also wishes to purchase various supplies for tending to this fruit, such as fertilizers and manure, in order to have an excellent harvest.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and supplies for growing pineapple.

loans.name: Evaristo

texts.es: El Sr. Evaristo es cliente de la institución que desde muy joven, radica en Santa Cruz, es oriundo de la ciudad de La Paz, se vino ha trabajar a Santa Cruz buscando un futuro mejor y mejores condiciones de vida, empezó comercializando bolsas de plásticos, seguidamente comercializo abarrotes. Fundo una asociación  en uno de los mercados más populares de la ciudad de Santa Cruz, donde comercializa ropa interior desde hace 18 años. El cliente menciona que se encuentra satisfecho por los logros obtenidos.  La familia la componen 4 hijos y su esposa, los hijos actualmente estudian. El crédito que solicita es para la compra de mercadería, ropa interior por mayor para niños, es una persona muy amable y cordial con sus clientes, se encuentra agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado ya que le permite crecer en su negocio y mejorar la, calidad de vida de toda su familia.
texts.en: Mr. Evaristo has been a member of this institute since he was young. He lives in Santa Cruz, but is originally from La Paz. He came to Santa Cruz in search of a better future and better living conditions. He started out selling plastic bags, then went on to sell groceries. He founded an association in one of the most popular markets in the city of Santa Cruz, where he has been selling undergarments for 18 years. Our member states that he is satisfied with the goals that he has achieved. His family consists of his 4 children and his wife. His children are currently in school. The loan that he is requesting will be used to purchase merchandise--children's underwear in bulk. He is a very kind and cordial person with his customers. He is grateful to the institute for the support they have given him since it has helped his business grow, and he has been able to improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase undergarments in bulk.

loans.name: Sandra Eloisa

texts.es: Sandra Eloísa es una de las clienta activa de Fundación León 2000, es una emprendedora que toda la vida a buscado como salir adelante, con el crédito otorgado anteriormente nos expresa la emprendedora que aumento su mercadería para ofrecerle a su clientes que la visitan y que además ella visita. Es una emprendedora perseverante que se traza objetivos en su vida para crecer cada día, cumplió unos  de sus sueños de independizarse generando ingresos para apoyar en los gastos del hogar. La emprendedora Sandra está solicitando financiamiento para comprar más ropas, zapatos, sandalias, short, camias, cosméticos entre otros productos que sus clientes le solicitan.
texts.en: Sandra Eloísa is one of the active members of Fundación Leon 2000. She is an entrepreneur and all of her life she has been looking for ways to get ahead. She told us that with her previous loan she implemented the stock of her products in order to sell them to the customers that visit her and to those she goes visit. She is a persevering entrepreneur who sets new life goals to grow every day. She made one of her dreams come true by becoming independent, earning money to help paying for her family’s expenses. Sandra is requesting a loan to buy more clothes, shoes, sandals, shorts, shirts and cosmetics among other products that her customers have requested.

loans.use: To buy clothes, shoes, sandals, shorts, shirts and cosmetics.

loans.name: Rosa Lina

texts.es:
Rosa, quiere continuar mejorando el negocio, para mantener a la clientela, por esto solicita un nuevo préstamo para comprarse cerdos para el destazo y frutas frescas para ofrecerle a los clientes como sandias, naranjas, melon, uvas, mango, esperando con esta inversión mantenerse en el mercado.
La experiencia que ha tenido Rosa con el préstamo ha sido muy buena, es por eso que quiere mantener con los préstamos para seguir creciendo, aunque en sus ultimos pagos presento sus pagos con dias de atraso, esto no le permite a esta fecha poder republicar el prestamo.
texts.en: Rosa wants to keep improving her business and maintain her customer base.  For this reason she is requesting a new loan to buy pigs to butcher and fresh fruit such as watermelon, oranges, melon, grapes and mango to offer her customers.   She is hoping this investment will keep her in business.  Rosa's loan experiences have been very positive and so, for this reason, she wants to keep taking out loans to continue growing even though she made her last payments late and was not allowed to republish the loan.

loans.use: purchase pigs and watermelon, oranges, melon, grapes and mango.

loans.name: Luisa

texts.es:
La señora luisa cuenta con 25 años de edad y está casada con el señor julio cesar quien es taxista, tienen 2 hijos, Liliana y Roberto, de los cuales solo 1 estudia cursa el primer año de primaria, ya que el menos apenas tiene 2 años, ella tiene un ciber café con la cual lleva 4 años.
Ella dice que decidió iniciar con este negocio porque buscaba apoyar a su familia, para mejorar su calidad de vida y contar con una buena solvencia económica y así continuar ayudando a sus hijos con sus estudios, el crédito que recibió, lo va a invertir en la compra de 2 computadoras, memorias USB, hojas, etc. 
El sueño más grande que tiene doña luisa es el de invertirle mucho mas al negocio para hacerlo crecer rápidamente, ya que quiere ampliar un poco mas su local y acondicionarlo mejor, puesto que así incrementara sus ingresos, y asegurar la educación profesional de sus hijos.
Dice que está profundamente agradecida con los donadores de kiva y fundación realidad, por este gran apoyo y confianza que les están brindando.
texts.en:
Luisa is 25 years old, she is married with Julio Cesar, who is a taxi driver, and she has 2 children, Liliana and Roberto; only one of them goes to school, attending the first year of primary school, as the youngest is only 2 years old. She has been running an Internet Café for 4 years.
She says she has decided to start this activity because she was looking for a way to support her family, to improve her standard of living and to count on a good economic solvency to thus keep on paying for her children’s education. The loan she has requested will be invested in the purchase of 2 computers, USB cables, papers and so on.
Luisa’s biggest dream is to invest much more in her activity to make it grow more quickly, as she wants to enlarge and improve her working space a little bit, because in this way she will increase her earnings, thus granting a professional education to her children.
She says she is deeply grateful to Kiva and Fundación Realidad’s lenders for the big support and deep trust she has been granted.

loans.use: To buy 2 computers, USB cables and papers.

loans.name: Teofilo

texts.es:
Teofilo, de 36 años, es un hombre bueno, amable y muy trabajador. Está casado con Gilmit de 33 años, con quien tiene tres hijos, Jhon de 13, Rizer de 10 y Tolita de 13 años, ellos son su motor para continuar trabajando, pues su fin es brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. Viven juntos en una casa propia, siendo una  familia unida y con deseos de salir adelante.
El trabajo de Teofilo consiste en la siembra de productos regionales, entre ellos, esta el plátano, yuca y maíz, productos que tiene mucha demanda en el mercado.  Por tanto él es considerado como uno de los mejores agricultores, pues sus productos muestran una mejor calidad.  Su trabajo lo realiza en propia chacra, en donde tiene un  promedio de 30 hectáreas que están sembrados éstos productos. 
Además cuenta con el  apoyo de su familia, que siempre están a su lado para ayudarlo en cualquier trabajo  que necesite.
