Lleva realizando éste trabajo por más de 18 años, y hasta el momento lo ha hecho sin descansar, pues su único fin es progresar y  brindar el tan anhelado sueño de dar una mejor educación a sus hijos. Este será el crédito número 6 con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos, por otro lado se compromete a seguir siendo puntual con sus pagos y cuotas programadas como en anteriores créditos que tuvo. Lle encanta pertenecer a su banco comunal ya que todos son muy responsables y solidarios. Con el monto solicitado 1500 soles, comprará abono para nutrir sus tierras, además de algunos plantas  de cacao, pues considera como una buena inversión y del espera será un negocio  muy prometedor.
texts.en:
Teofilo, age 36, is a good, kind, and very hardworking man. He is married to Gilmit, age 33, with whom he has three children: Jhon, age 13, Rizer, age 10, and Tolita, age 13. They are his driving force to continue working as his goal is to offer them a better quality of life. They live together in a home that he owns, and they are a very united family who has the desire to get ahead in life.

Teofilo's job consists of planting regional produce, like bananas, cassava, and corn, crops that are in high demand at the market. As such, he is considered to be one of the best farmers because his produce is of the best quality. He grows said crops on his own farm, which is about 30 hectares in area.

He also has his family's support as they are always at his side for whatever he may need. He has been in agriculture for over 18 years, and up to this point, he has done so without stopping as his only goal is to progress and to give his children that much-desired dream of getting an education. This will be his sixth loan with MFP. Moreover, he hopes to get your collaboration so that he can continue with his goals. On the other hand, he also commits to continue being punctual with his programmed repayments like he has been on his previous loans. He enjoys being a part of his communal bank since all its members are very united and responsible. With this 1,500.00 PEN loan, he will purchase fertilizer to nourish his fields and some cacao plants as he feels that they are a good investment and a promising venture.

loans.use: to purchase cacao plants and sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Reina Isabel

texts.es: Reina, nuevamente solicita un nuevo préstamo, debido a la demanda de sus productos de primera necesidad el cual comprara: gaseosas, gatorade, jugos, galletas, boquitas, dulces y otros productos que se necesitan en el hogar, teniendo variedad lograra mejores ingresos cada día. El préstamo anterior le ayudo porque no solo aumentaron sus ventas también en clientes, el cual ha mantenido el negocio estable.
texts.en: Reina is requesting a new loan as a result of her essential products being in demand. She will buy pop, Gatorade, juices, cookies, chips, sweets and other products that are needed in the home. Having a variety of products means higher sales every day. The previous loan she received helped her, as she was able to increase her sales and clientele, which has kept her business stable.

loans.use: buy pop, Gatorade, juices, cookies, chips and sweets.

loans.name: Maritza

texts.es: Maritza, de 48 años, es una mujer emprendedora y muy luchadora, es madre de tres hijos de los cuales dos son mayores y solo Gabriela de 16 años vive a su lado y depende de ella para su educación y poder tener una mejor calidad de vida. Con el tiempo quedo viuda y a raíz de ello tuvo que hacerle frente a todas necesidades del hogar, ahora trabaja mucho para poder tener una mejor calida de vida junto a su menor hija. El negocio que se dedica es el de administrar un taller de torno (lugar donde reparan motores lineales), por lo que lleva realizandolo por más de 14 años y está a su cargo contratar a cuatro personas que se encargan de hacer el trabajo mas pesado. Le gusta mucho lo que hace pues se considera una buena administradora y siempre tiene los contactos necesario para así poder tener buenos negocios, además ofrece oportunidad laboral a mas personas y eso le es gratificante. Espera seguir con su trabajo pero necesita de una inversión para comprar algunas herramientas y equipos necesarios. Este será el crédito número 3 con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá mas asegura de avanzar con su negocio, por su parte se compromete una vez mas a seguir siendo una socia cumplida en el pago de sus cuotas, esta muy contenta de trabajar junto a los de su banco comunal ya que todos son muy solidarios y muy responsables. Con el monto solicitado 2000 soles, comprará materiales y herramientas para implementar su taller de soldaduras.
texts.en: Maritza, 48, is a tenacious and enterprising woman.  She is the mother of 3 children, 2 of whom are now adults.  Only Gabriela, 16, lives with her and depends upon her for her education and quality of life.  Maritza is a widow, and this is the key reason she has had to provide for all the needs of the household.  Now she is working very hard so that she can provide a better quality of life for her minor daughter.  Maritza has been running a lathe workshop (a place where they repair linear motors) for more than 14 years; she hires 4 workers to do the heavier work.  She likes this work very much, because she considers herself to be a good administrator, and she always has the contacts she needs to have a good business.  In addition, she is able to offer employment opportunities to more people, and this is gratifying.  She hopes to continue with her work, but she needs to make an investment in some tools and other equipment that she needs.  This will be her 3rd loan with MFP, and she is very content to know that she will have financial support, because in this way she will feel more sure that she can make progress with her business.  On her part, she promises once again to continue to make all of her loan payments as scheduled.  She is very content to be working with the other members of her communal bank, because they are all very supportive and responsible.  With the sum of 2,000 Peruvian soles she requests, she will buy materials and tools for her repair workshop.

loans.use: to buy tools to equip her lathe shop

loans.name: Aracely Del Carmen

texts.es:
La señora Aracely del Carmen es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora quien se dedica al comercio de ropa y cosméticos desde hace 6 años. El crédito lo invertirá en ropa, útiles escolares y cosméticos.
Ella tiene un niño de 7 años y su meta es poder terminar sus estudios superiores en administración de empresa turística y hotelera.
texts.en:
La señora Aracely del Carmen es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora quien se dedica al comercio de ropa y cosméticos desde hace 6 años. El crédito lo invertirá en ropa, útiles escolares y cosméticos.
Ella tiene un niño de 7 años y su meta es poder terminar sus estudios superiores en administración de empresa turística y hotelera.

loans.use: buy clothing, school supplies and cosmetics.

loans.name: Brianda Ivett

texts.es:
La señora brianda cuenta con 22 años de edad y está casada con el señor bricio, con quien tiene 1 hijo se llama bricio y tiene 2 años de edad, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de antojitos desde hace más 1 año.
Dice que inicio con este pequeño negocio, ya que quería buscar la manera de apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa y mejorar un poco sus gastos, para tener una muy buena calidad de vida, el crédito que recibió lo invirtió en la compra de más insumos como: chiles, jitomates, cebollas, carne, aceite, sal, quesos, lechuga, arroz, y frijol, Para así continuar con la preparación de sus ricos antojitos.
Ella está convencida que uno de sus sueños se podrá cumplir ya que es el de hacer crecer mucho mas su negocio, puesto que quiere construir un local, para poner un restaurante y así tenerlo más surtido, con una amplia variedad de platillos, y así incrementara y mejorara sus ingresos.
Brianda dice que está muy agradecida con los donadores de kiva, por este gran apoyo que le están brindando, pero sobre todo por la confianza, ya que con esta ayuda ha logrado mejorar el negocio y la vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Brianda is 22 years old and she is married with Bricio. They have 1 child, whose name is Bricio and who is 2 years old. She has been preparing and selling snacks for more than 1 year.
She said she has started this small activity because she wanted to find a way to help her husband paying for the family expenses, and to improve their income a little bit in order to reach a good standard of living. The loan she has requested has been invested in the purchase of ingredients such as chili peppers, tomatoes, onions, meat, oil, salt, cheeses, lettuce, rice and beans in order to keep on preparing her tasty snacks.
She is convinced that one of her dreams will come true, the one she has of making her activity grow more. She wants to build a structure where to open a restaurant, and to offer a wide variety of dishes to increase and improve her earnings.
Brianda says that she is deeply grateful to Kiva’s lenders for the big support they are giving her, but even more for their trust, as thanks to this support she has succeeded in improving her activity and her family’s life.

loans.use: To buy ingredients such as chili peppers, tomatoes, onions, meat, oil, salt, cheeses, lettuce, rice and beans.

loans.name: Maria Petrona

texts.es:
La señora Maria Petrona es casada, tiene 48 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 3 hijos de los cuales ninguno esta estudiando, se dedica a la confección de tejidos: gabachas y delantales, y a prestar sus servicios de cocinera en otro negocio, tiene 4 años de experiencia, brindando sus servicios de cocina, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica a la panadería.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra de medicamentos para mejorar su salud, ya que quiere seguir apoyando a su familia a salir hacia adelante.
texts.en:
Ms. Maria Petrona is a married 48-year-old woman who never had the opportunity to get an education. She has 3 children who are not currently in school. She makes gabachas (traditional Guatemalan aprons) and aprons for a living. She also works as a cook in another business and has 4 years of kitchen experience. She gets support from her husband, who works as a baker.

She is requesting a loan that she will use to purchase medication to improve her health because she wants to continue supporting her family so that they can get ahead.

loans.use: to cover health-related expenses.

loans.name: Neiro

texts.es:
Neiro, de 38 años, es una hombre bueno, amable y muy trabajador. Convive con Rosita de 28 años, con quien tiene cuatro hijos. Es así que dia a día trabaja mucho para brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia con quienes habitan en una rustica casa que es de su propiedad y en donde enseña a sus hijos a ser personas responsables y de bien para la sociedad. Neiro, realiza un trabajo que aprendió desde muy joven, que es la agricultura, sembrando semillas de cacao, plantas de plátanos, y maíz, sobre sus 60 hectáreas de tierra que posee en su chacra y que durante sus 20 años de trabajo, aprendió a que tiene que ser muy ordenado y organizado para hacer las cosas. Por otro lado cuenta con el apoyo de su pareja, sin embargo en tiempos de más trabajo debe contratar peones para que lo ayuden a cosechar y llevar los pesados sacos al lugar de venta. Le gusta mucho su trabajo, ya que le genera ingresos y a la vez no descuida de su familia. Recuerda que cuando empezó sufrió mucho para que lo sembrado de resultado, pero el tiempo le enseño técnicas y ahora es un buen agricultor producciendo uno de los mejores frutos de su localidad. Espera seguir creciendo y empezar a sembrar otros tipos de granos y así progresar poco a poco junto a su familia. Este será el quinto préstamo con MFP, esta muy contento de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá seguro de avanzar con su negocio, por otro lado se compromete una vez mas en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores créditos que tuvo. 
Con el monto solicitado 2500 soles, comprará semillas de arroz para sembrar, además realizará la conexión para tener el regado mecanizado en su chacra, ya que así le ahorrara dinero y tiempo.
texts.en:
Neiro is 38 years old and is a good man who is pleasant and very hardworking.  He lives with Rosita, 28, with whom he has four children.  He works hard every day to provide his family with a better quality of life, and has taught his children to be responsible people who contribute to society.  They live in their own house, which is built of simple, rustic materials.  

Neiro works as a farmer, a job that he learned at a very young age.  He plants cacao, banana plants, and maize, which he grows on 60 hectares of land on his farm.  During his 20 years of working he learned to be very organized in order to get things done.  He also gets help from his partner, though at times when there is more work he has to hire laborers to help him harvest and bring the heavy bags to the place where he sells his produce.  Neiro really likes his work, since it generates income and allows him to stay close to his family.  He remembers that when he started out he struggled hard to get results, but over time he developed skills and is now a good farmer who produces some of the best crops in his community.  He hopes to keep growing and to begin planting other types of crops, which would allow him and his family to gradually get ahead.  

This will be Neiro’s fifth loan with MFP.  He is very happy to know that he will have financial support, since that makes him feel confident to go forward with his business.  He promises to make all of his payments on time, as he did with his previous loans.  

Neiro has asked for 2500 soles to purchase rice seeds for planting. He will also use the money to set up a mechanized irrigation system on his farm, since that will save him time and money.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds and improve his irrigation system.

loans.name: Adela

texts.es:
Adela vive con su esposo y sus dos  hijos, es agricultora, siembra granos básicos junto a la familia, el negocio lo inicio por iniciativa propia y con la ayuda de su familia, trabaja todos los días a tiempo completo, no tiene horario fijo para atender a sus clientes.
Ella esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas, como semilla, abono, herbicidas, esta compra le ayudara a mejorar sus cosechas y sus ingresos económicos.
Su mayor sueño es obtener buenas cosechas para mejorar su ingresos y vivir feliz con su familia.
texts.en:
Adela lives with her husband and two children. She’s a farmer and grows basic grains with her family. She initiated her business and with the help of her family, works fulltime every day. She doesn’t have a fixed schedule to attend to her clients.
She’s requesting a loan to buy farming supplies, like seeds, manure and herbicides. This loan will help her improve her crops and her income.
Her biggest dream is to grow a good crop that will improve her income and live happily with her family.

loans.use: buy seeds, manure and herbicides.

loans.name: Edith

texts.es:
La señora Edith cuenta con la edad de 47 años y está casada con el señor Elpidio, con quien tiene 4 hijos de los cuales solo Alexis estudia, cursa el tercer año de preescolar, ya que los demás están casados, ella tiene una, tienda de abarrotes con la cual lleva 20 años.
Ella dice que empezó con este negocio porque quiere mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia y tener una buena solvencia económica, también para empezar a ahorrar y asegurar el futuro educativo de su hijo, el crédito que recibió lo va a invertir en la compra de refrescos, aguas, huevos, galletas, aceite, leche, arroz, azúcar, frijol, jabón etc. para tener un poco mas surtido su negocio. 
Una de las metas que tiene doña Edith es la de hacer crecer muchísimo más su negocio, puesto que quiere ampliar su local, para poner tener aun mas surtida su tienda y así mejorar e incrementar sus ventas e ingresos.
Esta muy agradecida con FRAC y los donadores de kiva, por este gran apoyo que les están ofreciendo, ya que gracias a esa ayuda su negocio y vida de su familia mejoraran bastante.
texts.en:
Edith is 47 years old, she is married with Elpidio and they have 4 children, of whom only Alexis goes to school, attending the third year of Preschool, as the others are all married. She has been running a groceries store for 20 years.
She says she started this activity because she wanted to improve her family’s standard of living as well as her own, and to have a good economic solvency. She also wanted to start saving to grant an educational future to her son. The loan she has requested will be used to buy drinks, water, eggs, biscuits, oil, milk, rice, sugar, beans and ham to stock her shop up a bit more.
One of Edith’s goals is to make her activity grow a lot, as she wants to expand her shop in order to stock it up even more, consequently improving her sales and earnings.
She is deeply thankful to FRAC and to Kiva’s lenders for the great support they are offering her, as thanks to this help her activity and the life of her family with improve a little more.

loans.use: To buy drinks, water, eggs, biscuits, oil, milk, rice, sugar, beans and ham.

loans.name: Felix Pedro

texts.es:
El señor Felix Pedro es un hombre trabajador y emprendedor quien se dedica al comercio de hojas las cuales ocupan para la realización de comidas típicas como el nacatamal, vaho, tamal, yoltamal y también son utilizadas para servir ciertas comidas como el vigoron, el chancho con yuca…etc.
Él se dedica a este negocio desde hace 15 años e invertirá el crédito en ellos con el fin de aumentarlo.
texts.en:
Sr. Felix Pedro is an enterprising and hardworking man who sells the plantain leaves used to cook traditional dishes such as nacatamal (corn dough filled pork or chicken, rice, potatoes, tomatoes, onion, and sweet pepper) vaho (a mixture of meat, green plantains and yucca) tamal (corn cakes), yoltamal (corn tamales). They are also used to serve certain dishes such as vigoron (yuca, pork rind and cabbage salad), el chancho con yuca (pork fried with yuca and topped with tomatoes, onions and cabbage)…etc.

He has been engaged in this business for 15 years and will invest the loan in purchasing more plantain leaves.

loans.use: to buy plantain leaves.

loans.name: Juana Aracelly

texts.es:
La señora Juana, de 49 años de edad, habitante de la ciudad de León, es madre de tres hijos, se dedica a vender comida desde hace 7 años. Este negocio lo inicio con ayuda de sus hermanos y le ha sido de mucha apoyo  porque ha logrado mantener los gastos de su hogar, independizarse, sentirse útil ahora que todos sus hijos  ya son independientes y viven  aparte, este negocio le permite desarrollarse mas comerciante , ser dinámica y activa. 
Ella realizo el crédito para compra de pollo, carne , jugos, arroz, aceite pues son productos que utiliza para preparar su comida casera que tanto solicitan sus clientes. Ella esta muy feliz y motivada lo mucho que ha logrado con este negocio donde recibe niños, jóvenes y familias que le comprar comida. Por eso le gusta mantener a satisfechos y bien atendido a sus clientes mejorando su servicio cada día.
texts.en: Juana is 49 years old, lives in the city of León and is the mother of 3 children. She has been selling her homemade food for the last 7 years. She initiated this business with the help of her siblings and it has brought her much support because she’s been able to manage her household expenses, be independent, feel useful now that her children are independent and live apart. This business allows her to develop as a business owner, be dynamic and active. She requested the loan to buy chicken, beef, juice, rice and oil, since these are the ingredients she uses to make the homemade dishes that her clients demand. She’s very happy and motivated by how much she’s achieved with this business where children, youngsters and families come to buy food. That’s why she likes to keep her clients satisfied and well-attended to, improving her service every day.

loans.use: buy chicken, beef, juice, rice and oil.

loans.name: Veronica Del Socorro

texts.es:
La señora Verónica del Socorro es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora quien tiene una sastrería. Este negocio lo inicio hace 3 años junto a su esposo con una pequeña docena de ropa, ellos primeros laboraron para su cuñado y luego se independizaron.
El crédito invertirá en telas para uniformes ya que tiene muchos encargos y su meta es que su taller crezca. Verónica mencionó que gracias a los créditos su negocio ha crecido y con las ganancias logro construir su casa.
texts.en:
Sra. Verónica del Socorro is a hardworking and enterprising woman who has a tailoring shop. She started this business with her husband three years ago with just a dozen garments. They worked at first for a brother-in-law and then branched out on their own.

She will invest the loan in fabric for uniforms since she has many on order and her goal is to expand her shop. Verónica mentioned that her business has grown thanks to loans and she has been able to build her house with the profits.

loans.use: to purchase fabric, thread, buttons...etc.

loans.name: Sègla Raoul

texts.fr: Sègla Raoul est âgé de 34 ans et vit au Bénin. Sègla Raoul a arrêté l’école au niveau secondaire. Sègla Raoul est marié à une certaine Josiane. Le couple a trois enfants. En plus de leurs enfants, le couple a trois autres enfants à charge. Certains des enfants sont scolarisés et tous à leur charge. Sègla Raoul vit ensemble sa femme et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Pour subvenir aux besoins de sa famille, Sègla Raoul a appris l'électronique, activité qu'il exerce depuis une dizaine d'années dans sa région et qui lui procure des revenus non négligeables. Parallèlement à cette activité, Sègla Raoul vend des appareils de sonorisation. Sègla Raoul s'approvisionne au Nigéria. Grâce au revenu que lui génère cette activité, Sègla Raoul contribue aux différentes dépenses de sa famille. Pour satisfaire aux besoins de sa clientèle de plus en plus grandissante, Sègla Raoul sollicite un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les deux premiers prêts reçus par Sègla Raoul ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: Sègla Raoul is 34 years old and lives in Benin.  He left school at the secondary level.  He is married to a woman named Josiane and they have three children together.  In addition to their children, they have three other children in their care.  Some of the children go to school and all are their dependents. Sègla Raoul lives with his wife and children.  The couple jointly takes care of the various household expenses.  In order to provide for his family, Sègla Raoul has learned electronics.  He has been involved in this field, locally, for about ten years, and this activity brings him a significant income.  Additionally, he also sells sound equipment.  He buys his merchandise in Nigeria.  Thanks to the income generated by this activity, Sègla Raoul contributes to the family's various expenses.  In order to meet the demand of an ever-increasing number of customers, he is requesting a third loan from ALIDé.  His two previous loans were well repaid.

loans.use: to buy electronic equipment.

loans.name: Ma Del Rosario

texts.es:
La señora María del rosario cuenta con 49 años de edad y está casada con el señor Rafael quien es maestro, tienen 5 hijos de los cuales solo aleida y Jerónimo estudian, cursan el tercer año de secundaria y tercer año de primaria, ya que los demás están casados, ella se dedica a la elaboración de manualidades desde hacen 25 años.
Ella dice que decidió iniciar con esta actividad ya que quería buscar la manera de apoyar a su esposo y sacar a sus hijos adelante, para así ofrecerles una muy buena calidad de vida, también tener una mejor solvencia económica, el crédito que recibió lo invirtió en la compra de más material como: telas, botones, listones, chaquira, chaquiron, agujas, ganchos, hilos, estambre, etc.
La meta que tiene doña María (como mejor la conocen en su comunidad) es la de hacer crecer mucho mas su negocio, ya que lo que en verdad quiere es construir un local poner una tienda de manualidades, para tener más variedad de artículos y así mejorar sus ingresos, lo que le ayudara para apoyar a sus hijos con sus estudios profesionales.
“Le doy las gracias a Fundación realidad y los donadores de kiva, por confiar en mí y brindarme todo su apoyo”.
texts.en:
María Del Rosario is 49 years old, she is married with Rafael, a teacher, and they have 5 children, of whom only Aleida and Jerónimo are students, attending the third year of secondary education and the third year of primary school; the other children are married. She has been creating handicrafts for 25 years.
She says she decided to start this activity as she wanted to find a way to support her husband and to provide for her children, in order to offer them a very good standard of living, as well as to gain a better economic solvency. The loan she has requested will be used to buy more materials, such as fabric, buttons, ribbons, chaquira beads*, chaquiron beads**, needles, hooks, threads and woolen yarn.
The goal for María (she is known by this name in her community) is to make her activity grow much more, as what she really wants is to build a structure where to open a handicrafts shop in order to have a wider variety of items to sell and to consequently improve her earnings; this will help her supporting her children in their professional education.
“I am thankful to Fundación Realidad and to Kiva’s lenders for showing they have faith in me by offering me all their support”.

<cite>*very small, brightly colored beads which are used in traditional Latin American crafts, especially in Mexico</cite>
<cite>**brightly colored beads which are used in traditional Latin American crafts, especially in Mexico</cite>

loans.use: To buy fabric, buttons, ribbons, chaquira beads, chaquiron beads, needles, hooks, threads and woolen yarn.

loans.name: Rigoberto

texts.es:
Rigoberto, se ha decidido por otro préstamo, el cual lo necesita para iniciar un nuevo negocio y ocupación, comprara un compresor y una bomba para la instalación de un lavado de vehículo, esto le permitirá mejorar sus ingresos, ya que no dependera solamente del taxi, a través de estos préstamos ira superándose poco a poco.
Él considera haber tenido una experiencia positiva con el préstamo, por esto se decidió a obtener un nuevo.
texts.en: Rigoberto has decided to take out another loan, which he needs to launch a new business and activity. He will buy a compressor and a pump to install a car wash. This will allow him to increase his income, because he will not depend solely on the taxi. Thanks to these loans he will be more and more successful. He considers that he has had a positive experience with the loan program and therefore he decided to apply for a new one.

loans.use: to buy a compressor and a pump to install a car wash.

loans.name: Celeste Group

texts.es: El Banco de Emprendimiento CELESTE–26 es un banco  nuevo pero con socias antiguas que decidieron conformar otro banca llamada celeste son conocidas ente ellas y  responsables la presidenta es la Sra.  María  se dedica al comercio joyería, de venta de aretes y otros vende por una de las calles concurridas de la ciudad de La Paz y también en  una de las ferias mas concurridas es responsable y muy cumplida y de esa manera la eligieron  como presidenta,  la señora es separada ya no tiene hijos por mantener solicito el crédito para la compra de joyas para tener variedad de joyas y así ofrecer mas productos a sus clientes y de esta manera aumentar su capital ya que es muy dedicada a su trabajo.
texts.en: The Bank of Entrepreneurship CELESTE-26 is a new bank, but with old members who decided to make another bank called "celeste" [heavenly].  They are well-known amongst themselves and responsible.  The president is María.  She works in jewelry sales, selling earrings and other things.  She sells along one of the crowded streets in the city of La Paz, and also in one of the most busy markets.  She is responsible and very polite.  For this reason, they chose her to be president.  She is separated and has no children to care for.  She is asking for the loan to buy jewelry to have a variety of jewelry and therefore offer more products to her customers.  This way she will increase her capital since she is very dedicated to her work.

loans.use: buy a variety of jewelry.

loans.name: Jeronima Francisca

texts.es: La señora Jerónima es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora quien tiene un negocio diversificado vende comida, sopas los domingos y lunes, alquila unos cuartos, tiene una pequeña venta, vende artesanias etc. Ella invertirá el crédito en los negocios con el fin de salir adelante.
texts.en: Jerónima is a hard-working and enterprising woman who has a diversified business.  She sells food, soups on Sunday and Monday, she rents some rooms, she has a little store, she sells handicrafts, etc.  She will invest the loan in the businesses with the goal of getting ahead.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for each one of her businesses.

loans.name: Rosa Candida

texts.es: Rosa, de nuevo solicita un préstamo para mejorar su inventario y comprar mercadería para mejorar sus ventas y comprar pescado, camarones, curiles y comprar por mayor semilla de marañón, de esa forma lograra mejores ganancias. El préstamo anterior le ayudo porque la mercadería que compro le ayudo a generar más ingresos y le sirvieron para comprar medicinas debido a problemas de salud y su familia está estable debido a que ha contribuido a los gastos de la casa.
texts.en: Rosa is once again seeking a loan so that she can buy more stock and improve sales. She wishes to buy fish, shrimps, oysters, and marañón (cashew nut fruit) wholesale so that she can earn more money. Her last loan helped generate more income from sales, so she was able to pay for medicines for her health problems and contribute to household expenses. Rosa’s family is more settled as a result.

loans.use: to buy fish, shrimps, oysters, and marañón

loans.name: Vivian Del Socorro

texts.es:
La señora Vivian es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora de 34 años quien se dedica al comercio de artesanía desde hace 9 años, es casada y tiene un hijo de 13 años. El crédito que solicita es de autoestima que está destinado al uso personal de los clientes el cual necesita para realizarse unos exámenes y comprar unas medicinas.
Su meta es seguir creciendo y mejorando…
texts.en:
Vivian is 34, and a hard-working, enterprising woman who has been selling handicrafts for nine years. She is married and has a 13-year-old son.  

She is applying for a "self-esteem" loan, which is allocated for the personal use of clients. In this case, she needs it have medical tests done, and buy some medicines. Her goal is to continue growing and improving.

loans.use: To have medical tests carried out and to buy medicines.

loans.name: Cruz

texts.es: Cruz, nuevamente ha solicitado un nuevo préstamo, porque quiere seguir cultivando su tierra y cosechar maíz y frijoles para eso necesita los insumos agrícolas necesarios como: abono, semilla y fertilizantes, el cual ayudara a sus cosechas para dar más producción este año. El crédito anterior le ayudo mucho porque logro beneficiarse, logro hacer un pozo para utilizarlo para regar su cultivo y apoyado a su familia en lo que necesitan.
texts.en:
Cruz has applied for a loan once again, because he wants to continue farming his land and harvesting corn and beans. That's why he requires the necessary agricultural supplies, such as organic and chemical fertilizers, as well as seed. This will help his harvests to be more productive this year.

The previous loan really helped him, because he succeeded in making a profit. He managed to build a well to use in irrigating his crop, and has supported his family's needs.

loans.use: To buy organic and chemical fertlizers, as well as seed.

loans.name: Josefa Del Carmen

texts.es:
Josefa del Carmen Rivas La señora Josefa es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora. Ella es docente de secundaria desde hace varios años, y cada día procura ser mejor trabajador y brindar una buena atención a los jóvenes que son el futuro del país. 
Ella invertirá el crédito en mejoras del hogar en especial en un anexo para la cocina.
texts.en:
Señora Josefa del Carmen Rivas is a hardworking, enterprising woman. She has been a high school teacher for several years; each day her goal is to work even harder to assist her students who are the future of the country.

Josefa will use the loan to make improvements to her house, especially to the part that serves as her kitchen.

loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Graciela Del Carmen

texts.es:
Graciela, quiere seguir trabajando con préstamos, para darle mejoras al negocio, comprara mariscos en general (pescados de diferentes clases, langostas, camarones) para surtir el negocio con productos frescos de calidad, estos préstamos le ayudan a Graciela a tener el efectivo necesario para realizar compras periódicas porque sus productos se dañan rápido, no puede mantener una gran porción porque podría significar una perdida para ella.
Sus condiciones en torno al negocio y su familia son favorable, trabaja a diario para poderse mantener, para el pago del prestamo anterior tuvo atrasos, por eso no se ha podido republicar el prestamo.
texts.en:
Graciela wants to continue working with loans to improve her business. She will buy seafood in general (different kinds of fish, lobsters, shrimp) to supply her business with fresh, good quality products. The loans help Graciela get enough cash to make periodic purchases because her products spoil fast. She cannot buy them in bulk because this could mean she would lose.
The conditions concerning her business and family are favorable. She works daily to be able to keep herself.  She was late with the payments for the previous loan, so it could not be posted again.

loans.use: to buy different kinds of fish, lobsters, shrimp.

loans.name: Edith

texts.es:
Edith tiene 30 años de edad, es casada y su esposo trabaja en la albañilería, tiene 4 hijos de 9, 7, 5 y 3 años de edad, vive en Col. El Paraíso, San Pedro Sula.
Edith tiene dos años de tener su propio negocio de elaboración de tortillas de maíz normal y para hacer tacos. Estas tortillas las cocina en hornilla.
Anteriormente vendía ropa pero cuando empezó a tener sus hijos miro que el dinero no le ajustaba, decidió establecer este de tortillas ya que ha sido más rentable.
Su negocio se ha mantenido con la ayuda de los prestamos y de las ganancias a podido hacerle mejoras a la cocina.
Actualmente solicita el tercer préstamo para comprar harina de maíz y leña para elaborar tortillas y continuar  vendiendo ya que de este negocio espera darle el estudio a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Edith is 30 years old.  She is married, and her husband works in construction.  She has four children aged 9, 7, 5, and 3 years old.  She lives in Colonia El Paraíso, in San Pedro Sula.

For two years, Edith has had her own business making corn tortillas for use alone or for making tacos.  She cooks these tortillas on a burner.

Edith used to sell clothing, but when she began having children she saw that her money wouldn't reach far enough, and decided to set up this tortilla business, which has been very profitable.

She has kept her business going with the help of the loans and the earnings which have allowed her to make improvements to her kitchen.

She is currently requesting her third loan to buy cornflour and firewood for making tortillas and for continuing to sell them, as through this business she hopes to provide her children with an education.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for making tortillas, such as cornflour and firewood.

location.town: Colonia el Paraíso, San Pedro Sula

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es:
El Señor Manuel tiene 38 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposa con la cual ha procreado 6 hijos de las edades 18,16, 15, 12, 6 y 5 años. Reside en la comunidad de Brisas de Cuyamapa en el Municipio de Victoria, Yoro.
Don Manuel se dedica desde los 15 años a la producción agrícola, específicamente al cultivo de arroz, maíz y frijoles.
Él ha solicitado un crédito para la producción de arroz por la cantidad de 10,000 Lempiras, los que piensa invertir en la compra de fertilizantes y pago de mano de obra.
Don Manuel considera que producir arroz es muy rentable ya que le genera buenos ingresos, que le sirven para un respaldo económico  y  brindarle educación digna a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Manuel is 38 years old and is in a civil union with his wife. They have had six children who are 18, 16, 15, 12, 6 and 5 years old. He lives in the Brisas de Cuyamapa community in the municipality of Victoria, Yoro.

Manuel has made a living for the past 15 years in agriculture, specifically in rice, corn and bean cultivation. He is requesting a loan of 10,000 Lempiras to produce rice. He is thinking of investing in the purchase of fertilizers and manual labor payments. 

Manuel believes that rice production is very profitable as it has mad ea good income for him. He uses this income as a financial support and to provide a dignified education for his children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pay for manual labor.

loans.name: Dolores

texts.es:
Doña Dolores tiene 56 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 4 hijos mayores de edad entre 25 a 34 años, vive en la Colonia Satélite de San Pedro Sula.
Ella estableció un negocio de elaboración de comida hace aproximadamente 3 años y medio. Vende varios tipos de comida como ser: tajadas, pastelitos, enchiladas, baleadas, tacos y jugos naturales, también ofrece los servicios de desayunos y almuerzos a domicilio en algunas empresas. Decidió establecer este negocio para no depender de nadie y generar sus propios ingresos. Es muy trabajadora comienza desde las 5 de la mañana hasta las 8 de la noche.
Esta muy motivada y quiere continuar mejorando sus ventas, brindando un buen servicio a los clientes.
Agradece a ODEF y a Kiva por la oportunidad y confianza brindada. El préstamo que ha solicitado es para comprar los insumos necesarios para elaborar comida, como ser: harina de maíz, harina, carnes, verduras, manteca etc. Y para comprar freidoras que necesita.
texts.en:
Doña Dolores is 56 years old.  She is a single mother, with four grown children aged between 25 and 34 years of age.  She lives in Colonia Satélite in San Pedro Sula.

About three and a half years ago, Dolores started a business cooking food.  She sells different kinds of food such as tajadas (fried plantains), pastelitos (stuffed puff-pastry), enchiladas, baleadas (filled tortillas), tacos, and natural juices.  She also provides breakfast and lunch service from her home to several businesses.  She decided to establish this business so that she wouldn't need to depend on anybody, and could earn her own income.  She is very hard-working, starting at 5 a.m. and working till 8 p.m.

She is very motivated and wants to continue improving her sales and offering good service to her customers.

She is grateful to ODEF and to Kiva for this opportunity and the confidence being placed in her.  The loan that she is requesting is for purchasing the necessary ingredients for making her food, such as cornflour, flour, meat, vegetables, butter, etc., and for purchasing the fryers that she needs.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for making her food, such as meat, vegetables, flour, sugar, spices, etc, and for purchasing fryers.

loans.name: Alisandro

texts.es:
El Señor Alisandro tiene 38 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposa con la cual ha procreado 3 hijos de las edades 16, 13, y 8 años. Reside en la comunidad de Los Chagüites en el Municipio de Siguatepeque, Comayagua.
Don Alisandro trabajaba anteriormente en un taller de soldadura, hace 3 años motivado por la situación económica difícil y las ganas de superarse, decidió establecer su propio negocio el cual consiste en una tienda de abarrotes y alimentos (Pulpería). El vende productos de la canasta básica familiar, refresco, carnes, productos de aseo y limpieza.
Don Alisandro ha solicitado un crédito por la cantidad de 20,000 Lempiras los que piensa invertir en la compra de productos para abastecer su negocio y brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes, supliendo la demanda de productos alimenticios.
texts.en:
Señor Alisandro is 38 years old.  He lives in a common-law marriage with his wife, with whom he has three children aged 16, 13, and 8.  He lives in the community of Los Chagüites in the municipality of Siguatepeque in Comayagua.

Don Alisandro used to work in a soldering workshop, but three years ago, motivated by the difficult economic situation and his goals of getting ahead, he decided to establish his own business which is a grocery and food-store (a convenience store).  He sells basic everyday foodstuffs, sodas, meat, and cleaning products.

Don Alisandro has requested a loan for the sum of 20,000 lempiras, which he is planning to invest in the purchase of products to stock up his business and offer better service to his customers by meeting the demand for food products.

loans.use: to purchase products to stock up his business.

loans.name: Jehamy

texts.es:
Jehamy tiene 32 años de edad, es casada hace 15 años y tiene 2 hijos de 13 y 10 años de edad con lo cuales vive en El Barrio Guamilito, San Pedro Sula.
Jehamy hace 8 años emprendió su propio negocio un salón de belleza. Inicio su negocio con fondos propios, con mucho trabajo y dedicación ayudada por su prima han logrado mantener la clientela ofreciendo los servicios de planchado de cabello, secado, manicure, pedicure, tintes, extensiones de cabello y uñas acrílicas. Sus ingresos han mejorado mucho ya que sus clientes quedan satisfechos con el trabajo realizado y con las ganancias obtenidas a comprado mobiliario para el acondicionamiento del salón.
Ella decidió solicitar un préstamo de 17,000 lempiras, el cual piensa invertir en comprar productos para el cabello.
Su meta en el futuro es lograr establecer 2 salones más de belleza y un Spa, de los cuales podrá obtener más ingresos y así poder darle la educación y el sustento diario a su familia.
texts.en:
Jehamy is 32 years old and has been married for 15 years. She has two children who are 13 and 10 years old. She lives with them in Barrio Guamilito in San Pedro Sula. 

Eight years ago Jehamy started her own beauty salon business. She began the business with her own funds, along with a lot of work and dedication. She has been helped by her cousin and they have been able to maintain their clientele by offering services such as hair straightening and drying, manicures, pedicures, hair dying, hair extensions and acrylics. Her income has improved a lot as her clients are satisfied with the work she does. With the profits made she has purchased furnishings to out fit the salon. 

She decided to request a loan for 17,000 lempiras, which she thinks she will invest in the purchase of hair products. Her future goal is to be able to establish two more beauty salons and a spa through which she will be able to make a better income and be able to provide an education and daily sustenance for her family.

loans.use: to buy hair products.

location.town: Barrio Guamilito, San Pedro Sula, Cortes

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es: Yolanda, de 50 años, es una mujer buena, amable y muy dinámica, es conviviente con Pierre de 48 años con quien tiene tres hijos de los cuales Milagros ya es mayor en independiente, y solo viven a lado de Mijael de 15 y Bryan de 7 años, a quienes desea brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. Viven en su casa propia en donde a diario comparte la alegría de criar a sus menores hijos. Yolanda a diario tiene mucho trabajo en su casa, pero ella comienza su labor los fines de semana, cuando tiene muchos pedidos en la elaboración de pasteles y tortas, bocaditos cuya demanda es para eventos y acontecimientos sociales. Tiene su taller industrial muy bien implementado en su casa en donde a diario realiza su trabajo junto a su pareja. Lleva realizando éste trabajo por más de 18 años y durante este tiempo aprendió mucho sobre como realizar uno de los mejores postres de la ciudad. Le gusta lo que hace pues desde muy joven aprendió a elaborar estos alimentos gracias a su madre. Espera seguir progresando y mas adelante instalar una pastelería por el centro de la ciudad. Este será el primer crédito con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos, por su parte se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado de 800 soles, comprará ingredientes e insumos no perecibles para la elaboración de mas pasteles y bocaditos.
texts.en:
Yolanda is 50, and she is a good woman, who is friendly and very energetic. She has been living with Pierre for 48 years, and they have three children. Milagros is already an adult and independent. The only children that live with them are Mijael, 15, and Bryan, 7, to whom they wish to offer a better quality of life. They live in their own house, where every day they share the joy of raising their younger children. 

Yolanda has a lot of work in her house each day, but she starts her other work on weekends, when she has many orders for making cakes, tarts, and canapés. These treats are in demand for events and social gatherings.  

She has a well set up industrial workshop in her home, where with her partner, she does her work each day. She has been doing this work for more than 18 years, and during this time, she has learned a lot about how to make some of the best desserts in the city. 

She likes what she does, as thanks to her mother, she learned to make these foods from a very young age. She hopes to continue progressing, and someday set up a pastry shop in the centre of the city. 

This will be her first loan with MFP, so she is hoping for your help, in order to continue toward her objectives. For her part, she promises to pay her installments on time. With the amount of 800 soles applied for, she will buy ingredients and non-perishable supplies for making more cakes and canapés.

loans.use: To buy ingredients and supplies.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana, de nuevo solicita otro préstamo para comprar una bomba para su pozo, el cual lo necesitan para que sea más fácil sacar el agua y además comprar mercadería como elotes para hacer tamales y otros productos para la elaboración de comida y de esa manera mejorar la situación económica.
El préstamo que obtuvo antes le sirvió porque contribuyo con sus ganancias a los gastos de la casa y logro comprar lo necesario para su negocio.
texts.en:
Juana is requesting a further loan to purchase a pump for her well, which she needs to make it easier to fetch water.  She will also purchase ingredients such as corn for making tamales and other supplies for making food, and in this way improve her financial situation.

The loan that she obtained previously was useful to her because she contributed to the household expenses with her earning and was able to purchase what she needed for her business.

loans.use: to purchase a pump for her well.

loans.name: Jacoba

texts.es:
La Señora Jacoba, tiene 48 años de edad, esta casada, tiene 1 hijo de 7 años, reside en la comunidad de Kilometro 17 ubicada en el Municipio de Arizona, Atlántida.
El esposo de Doña Jacoba se dedica a trabajar como jornalero. 
Debido a la necesidad de tener ingresos extras para cubrir otros gastos en el hogar, hace año y medio se decidió a establecer su propio negocio de venta de ropa, además recibe ingresos adicionales por la venta de pastelitos de harina de maíz.
Ella ha solicitado un préstamo por la cantidad de 2,750 Lempiras para la compra de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños. 
Doña Jacoba esta motivada a seguir adelante con su negocio ya que su patrimonio ha crecido, posee una cuenta de ahorro con lo cual espera brindarle un buen nivel de estudio a su hijo.
texts.en:
Señora Jacoba is 48 years old.  She is married with a seven-year-old, and lives in the Kilometro 17 community which is located in the municipality of Arizona in Atlántida.  Doña Jacoba's husband works as a day-laborer. 

Owing to the need for extra income to cover other household expenses, she decided 18 months ago to establish her own business selling clothing.  She also receives additional income from selling filled cornflour pastries.

She has requested a loan for the sum of 2,750 lempiras for the purchase of clothing for women, men and children.
 
Doña Jacoba is motivated to continue progressing with her business as her assets have increased.  She has a savings account with which she hopes to provide her son with a good level of education.

loans.use: to purchase clothing.

loans.name: Delia Eustaquia

texts.es:
La señora Delia Eutaquia es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora de 44 años quien tiene pulpería desde hace 5 años. Ella invertirá el crédito en granos básicos, carne y chiverias…etc. Ella está casada y tiene dos hijos de 15 y 12 años los cuales son estudiantes.
Su meta es aumentar el negocio y salir adelante.
texts.en:
Señora Delia Eutaquia is a hard-working and enterprising woman of 44, who has had a convenience store for the last 5 years.  She will invest the loan in basic grains, meat, snack products, etc.  She is married and has two children aged 15 and 12 who attend school.

Her goal is to expand her business and get ahead in life.

loans.use: to purchase basic grains, meat, snack products, etc.

loans.name: Teresa Francisca

texts.es:
Teresa, estudio contabilidad trabajo en una empresa localizada en su ciudad de origen León como auxiliar contable pero quedo sin empleo y la difícil situación económica y la falta de trabajo la impulsaron a poner un negocio que le generara ingresos con su liquidación del trabajo anterior puso una pulpería con la que paga los gastos del hogar y mantiene a su pequeña hija de  4 años de edad. 
Ella solicito el crédito para compra de granos básicos, carne, pollo, gaseosas y ropa. Ya que necesita  mantener surtida su venta de productos para vender. Uno de sus planes es comprar estantes, vitrinas y un freezer para almacenar productos lácteos.
texts.en:
Teresa studied accounting and used to work as an assistant accountant in a business located in León, her home city.  However, she was left unemployed and the difficult economic situation and the lack of work impelled her to start up a business that would earn her income.  With her severance from her previous employment, she started up a convenience store with which she pays for her household expenses and supports her small daughter who is 4 years old.

She is requesting a loan to purchase basic grains, meat, chicken, sodas and clothing, as she needs to keep her products stocked up for sale.

One of her plans is to purchase shelves, cabinets and a freezer for storing dairy products.

loans.use: to purchase basic grains, meat, chicken, sodas, and clothing.

loans.name: Tania

texts.es:
Tania, de 35 años, es una mujer buena, amable y muy trabajadora, es conviviente con German de 37 años con quien tiene dos hijos de 14 Gabriela y Angélica de 3, ella trabaja mucho todos los días para poder brindar a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida, vive en casa de los padres de su conviviente con quien tiene una buena relación. El trabajo de Tania consiste en la venta de productos cosméticos y otras mercaderías como ropa, zapatos o de acuerdo a la temporada. A diario sale en busca de sus clientes quienes en su mayoría son amigos, vecinos y familiares para ofrecer sus productos. 
Llleva realizando este trabajo por 14 años, y recuerda que en un principio esperaba a que llegaran los clientes a su casa en busca de sus productos, pero con el tiempo aprendió que para tener éxito en este tipo de trabajo tiene que salir en busca de los clientes y tener técnicas de convencimiento para vender y lo mas importante que vuelvan a comprarle nuevamente. Espera seguir trabajando y tener mucho éxito en adelante, ahora tiene muchas ventas y eso significa más ganancias y mejores condiciones que ofrecer a su familia. Este será el préstamo numero 5 con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. De igual manera de los préstamos recibidos anteriormente se compromete a ser un cliente puntual y muy responsable ya que todos en su banco comunal son muy responsables. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 soles, comprará productos y mercadería en oferta y tener en stock para salir a ofrecer entre sus diversos clientes.
texts.en:
Tania is 35 years old and she is a good, friendly and hardworking woman. She lives with her partner, German, who is 37 years old. They have two children, Gabriela who is 14 and Angélica who is 3. She works a lot every day to be able to give her children a better quality of life. They live in her partner's parent's home with whom she has a good relationship.

Tania's work consists of cosmetics sales as well as other merchandise like clothing and shoes or seasonal items. Each day she goes out to look for her customers, who are mainly her friends, neighbors and family members, in order to offer them her products. She has been doing this work for 14 years and she remembers that in the beginning she had hoped that her customers would come to her house to buy the products. With time, however, she learned that in order to be successful in this kind of work she has to go out in search of her customers and employ convincing tactics to be able to make sales. The most important thing is that they return to make purchases again. She hopes to continue working and have future success. Right now she has a lot of sales and this means more profits and better conditions for her family. 

This will be her fifth loan with MFP as she expects their collaboration to be able to continue with her goals. As she has with past loans she has received, she is committing to being a punctual client and very responsible as all of the members of her communal bank are responsible. With the 1,000 soles that she has requested, she will buy products and merchandise on sale and have these in stock to offer to her many customers.

loans.use: to buy more beauty products.

loans.name: Maria Herminia

texts.es: María, debido a la atención de nuestra institución y con el propósito de mejorar su vivienda, ha solicitado un nuevo préstamo para la compra de laminas, hierro y cemento, para reparar el techo y algunas paredes, esta inversion ayudara a que su familia viva en mejores condiciones de vida. El préstamo anterior le ayudo mucho porque logro pagar el estudio de su hermano y colaboro con los gastos de la casa.
texts.en:
María, thanks to the services of our institution and with the plan of improving her home, has requested a new loan for the purchase of sheeting, iron and cement to repair her roof and some walls.  This investment will help her family to have better living conditions.  

The previous loan helped her greatly, as she was able to pay for her brother's studies and help out with the household expenses.

loans.use: Compra de laminas, hierro y cemento.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Elsa

texts.es: Elsa es socia del Banco Comunal Magnolia, tiene 38 años, es madre de 2 hijos, tiene más de 6 años como socia por invitación de una amiga, se dedica a la venta de ropa de niños y bebes, esta orgullosa porque incrementó su mercadería gracias a los préstamos que ha recibido con facilidad, el capital es aprovechado para hacerlo trabajar y obtener ganancias, se siente bien porque esta ahorrando y gracias a los intereses que ganan sus ahorros puede educar a su hijo en un buen colegio, también le gusta las capacitaciones porque le enseñan a educar a su hijo, lo cual lo pone en práctica, el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de ropa para bebes y niños.
texts.en: Elsa is a member of the "Magnolia" communal bank.  She is 38 years old and is the mother of 2 children.  She joined this group at the invitation of a friend, and she's been a member for more than 6 years.  Elsa has a business selling clothing for babies and children.  She is proud, because she increased her merchandise, thanks to the loans that she has received with ease.  This capital will be put to use so that she can work and obtain earnings.  She feels good, because she is saving and thanks to the interest she earns, her savings can be used to educate her child in a good school.  In addition, she enjoys the training because they are teaching her to educate her son, which she puts into practice.  She will invest this loan in the purchase of clothing for babies and children.

loans.use: to buy clothing for babies and children

loans.name: Arlen María

texts.es:
La señora Arlen María tiene su propia vivienda en el municipio de el Sauce, es una madre con dos hijos bajo su cargo y actualmente está atravesando dificultades porque se ha visto afectada por los fenómenos naturales que han golpeado su vivienda y por ende ha estado en malas condiciones pero nunca ha perdido la esperanza de mejorar debido a que tiene mucho entusiasmo y coraje porque todas sus metas planteadas se empeña para cumplirlas a cabalidad. 

Por este motivo es que se presentó a Ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para la compra de algunos materiales de construcción como cemento, y ladrillo para iniciar el proceso de mejoramiento de su vivienda.

Está consciente que Ceprodel puede apoyarle ya que es por quinta vez que le financia crédito y espera que dicho crédito sea otorgado para así iniciar su obra de construcción en su humilde casa donde habita.
texts.en:
Señora Arlen María has her own home in the municipality of  El Sauce.  She is a mother with two young children in her care, and is currently facing difficulties as she has been affected by the natural disasters which have beaten up her home and left it in bad condition.  However, she has never lost hope in making improvements, thanks to her great enthusiasm and courage, as she strives to complete all her planned goals to the fullest extent.

For this reason she came to Ceprodel to request a loan for the purchase of some construction materials such as cement and bricks to begin the process of improving her home.

She is aware that Ceprodel can help her as this is her fifth time that she has taken out a loan, and she hopes that this loan will be given so that she can start her construction work on the humble home where she lives.

loans.use: to purchase cement and bricks.

loans.name: Rosamarie

texts.es: Rosamarie es socia del Banco Comunal Magnolia, tiene 36 años, es madre de 2 hijos, es casada, tiene mas de 2 años como socia, es docente, tiene su recreo, gracias a Finca Perú le va muy bien por que ahorra su dinero y porque aprendió a distribuir su ganancia y como invertirlo, gracias a Finca Perú tiene un negocio mas, que es una Fuente de Soda, donde también le va muy bien, los préstamos que recibió le ayudaron a mejorar, gracias a ello pudo comprarse sus muebles para su recreo y fuente de soda, el préstamo que solicita ahora lo invertirá en compra de mas mueble para la Fuente de Soda.
texts.en:
Rosamarie is a member of the Magnolia community bank.  She is the mother of two children and is married.  She has been a member for more than two years and is a teacher; she also has a coffee-shop.

Thanks to Finca Peru, things have been going very well for her. She has saved some money and because she learned to distribute her earnings and how to invest them, thanks to Finca Peru she has an additional business  which is a soda fountain.  This is also going very well for her.  The loans that she has received have helped her to grow, and thanks to this she has been able to purchase furniture for her coffee-shop and soda fountain.

She will invest this loan that she is now requesting in the purchase of more furniture for her soda fountain.

loans.use: to buy furniture for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and supplies

loans.name: Oscar Antonio

texts.es: El señor Oscar esta muy contento por el apoyo que le brinda Kiva , gracias al crédito anterior logro mejorar su cultivo de piña ya que la producción de fue de calidad , cancelo en tiempo y forma su préstamo y hasta compro 50 piedras canteras para ir mejorando su humilde vivienda , ahora sus planes futuros hacia su préstamo es poder inducir insumos y fertilizantes necesarios para darle un buen mantenimiento agrícola a su producción, pero no cuenta con los recursos necesarios para realizar la inversión .
texts.en: Oscar is very satisfied with the support Kiva provides. Thanks to his previous loan he was able to improve his pineapple crops with high-quality production, make his payments on time and purchase 50 quarry stones to make improvement to his humble home. Now he plans to use this loan to purchase necessary supplies and fertilizers to maintain his crops, since he doesn't have the necessary resources to invest on his own.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and supplies.

loans.name: Patricia Carolina

texts.es: Patricia, de nuevo solicita un nuevo préstamo con el propósito de que sus ventas sean mejores y comprar el producto para aumentar su inventario, comprara sacos de semilla de marañón para prepararla y luego venderla a los clientes de esa forma tendrá mayores ganancias. El préstamo anterior le ayudo mucho porque aumentaron sus ventas y pudo aportar para los gastos de la casa.
texts.en: Patricia is requesting a new loan to buy sacks of cashews to prepare to increase her inventory and sell to her customers with the goal of improving her sales and bringing in a better income.  Her previous loan helped her greatly because it increased her sales and she was able to contribute to the household expenses.

loans.use: purchase cashews.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is 52 years old and married to Magdalene.  They are blessed with four children.  He runs a general shop and also a hotel in the area of Kibera.  He has been in this business for the last 11 years and earns an income of 25,000 KES per month.

John has a good credit history with KADET and he is applying for his third loan of 60,000 KES from KADET LTD.  He plans to use this loan to expand business by buying more items like sugar, flour, cooking oil and tea to stock his store.  He will use the anticipated profit to educate his children.

John hopes to open another hotel and another shop.  He is very hardworking.

loans.use: to buy sugar, flour, cooking oil and tea to stock his shop.

loans.name: Abibatou

texts.fr: Abibatou est âgée de 39 ans et vit au Bénin. Abibatou n’a jamais fréquenté l’école. Abibatou est mariée à un certain Moussèdikou. Le couple a quatre enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. En plus de leurs enfants, le couple a un autre enfant à charge. Abibatou vit ensemble ses enfants et son mari. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Pour répondre aux divers besoins de la maison, Abibatou vend des produits vivriers (maïs, haricot, riz, farine de blé) dans un marché du Bénin. Abibatou s'approvisionne dans une ville du Bénin et dans une région du Bénin. Grâce aux revenus que lui génère cette activité, Abibatou contribue aux différentes dépenses de sa maison. Pour satisfaire aux besoins de sa clientèle de plus en plus grandissante, Abibatou sollicite pour une deuxième fois un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Le crédit reçu antérieurement par Abibatou a été bien remboursé.
texts.en:
Abibatou is 39 years old and lives in Benin.  Abibatou has never attended school.  Abibatou is married to Moussèdikou; together they have four children, all of whom attend school and are dependents.  In addition to their children, the couple takes care of another child as well.

Abibatou lives together with her children and her husband.  Abibatou and her husband both provide for the numerous household necessities.  In order to take care of these needs, Abibatou sells food essentials (corn, beans, rice, flour) in a Benin market. Abibatou stocks up in a Benin town and also in the surrounding region.  Thanks to her profits, Abibatou is able to assuage the many expenses of her household.  

In order to satisfy the needs of her ever-growing clientele, Abibatou is asking for her second loan via ALIDé.  The loan Abibatou previously received was properly repaid.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of food staples (corn, beans, rice, flour) for resale.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es:
Nancy, de 56 años, es una mujer amable y trabajadora. Está casada con Marcelo de 59 años, con quien tiene cinco hijos, y por lo cuales siempre procura brindarles educación y en el futuro sean personas de bien dentro de la sociedad. Juntos habitan en su casa propia, y a diario trabaja mucho para tener una vejez tranquila.
Todos los días Nancy se dirige al mercado mas cercano de su casa, ahí busca los mejores ingrediente y los productos mas frescos para luego dirigirse a su casa y comenzar con la preparación de sus delicioso platos de comida. Deja todo listo y a partir de las 5 de la tarde, instala su mesa y sillas en el frontis de su casa en donde comienza a ofrecer los mas deliciosos y sabrosos alimentos previamente preparados. Asi es como se gana la vida, pues su pasión es cocinar, además tiene la ventaja de haberse dedicado esto anteriormente, pero lo dejó debido a un asunto personal. Ahora lleva 8 años sin interrupciones realizando ésta actividad, y espera seguir trabajando por mas tiempo con el fin de progresar. Este será el crédito número 18 con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado se compromete a pagar de manera puntual sus cuotas como en sus créditos anteriores que tuvo. Con el monto solicitado 3000 soles, comprará ingredientes e insumos para continuar con su trabajo de venta de comida, también arreglará e implementará muebles para ofrecer mayor comodidad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Nancy, 56, is a pleasant and hardworking woman.  She is married to Marcelo, 59, with whom she has five children, to whom she always tries to give an education and for them to be good people in the future.  Together their live in their own house, and she works a lot every day to have a peaceful old age.

Every day Nancy goes to the market closest to her house.  There she looks for the best ingredients and the freshest products to later go home and begin preparing her delicious dishes.  She leaves everything ready, and from 5 in the afternoon on she sets up her table and chairs in the front part of her house where she begins to offer the most delicious and tasty previously prepared foods.

This is how she earns a living, since cooking is her passion.  She also has the advantage of having done this work before, but she left it for personal reasons.  Now she has been doing this work without interruption for eight years, and she hopes to continue working longer, with the goal of making progress.

This will be her eighteenth loan with MFP, for which she hopes for your collaboration so she can get on with her goals.  On the other hand, she promises to make her payments punctually, as with the previous loans she had.

With the requested loan of 3000 PEN she will buy ingredients and supplies to continue with her job selling food.  She also will fix and set up furniture to offer her customers greater comfort.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to prepare food and to buy tables and chairs, and to fix some.

loans.name: Pedro Antonio

texts.es: Pedro, nuevamente solicita un préstamo, con el propósito de aumentar en sus ventas y ofrecerles a sus clientes variedad de estilos y comprar mercadería como Cds, cáñamo y piedras para hacer pulseras, lapiceros, libretas, así lograra aumentar en sus ganancias y mantendrá siempre estable su negocio. El préstamo anterior ayudo para fortalecer el negocio y que sus ganancias ayudaran a su familia a que viva mejor que antes.
texts.en: Pedro is once again requesting a loan, with the goal of increasing his sales and offering his customers a wider selection. He plans to purchase merchandise like CDs, pens and notebooks, as well as hemp and stones to make bracelets, to increase his revenue and keep a stable business. The previous loan helped him strengthen his business, and his profits helped his family live better than they had been.

loans.use: Purchase CDs, pens and notebooks, as well as hemp and stones to make bracelets.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: purchase merchandise for her clothing sales business.

loans.name: Rocío

texts.es:
Rocío es socia del Banco Comunal Magnolia, tiene 38 años, es madre de 1 hijo, fue invitada por una amiga a integrar el Banco Comunal, es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace mas de 12 años, se dedica a la venta de cosméticos, zapatos, ropa por catálogo, gracias Finca Perú logró crecer su negocio, ahora no solo vende por catálogo, sino que también reparte. Se siente orgullosa por sus logros, uno de ellos es que su hijo terminó sus estudios secundarios, todo gracias a los préstamos que ha recibido, se siente bien siendo socia, por que le ayuda a mejorar en su negocio como con su familia, también le enseñan a ahorrar y como distribuir su negocio.
el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de mercaderías como medias y ropa para el colegio como zapatos y uniforme.
texts.en:
Rocío, 38,  is a member of Magnolia Communal Bank and mother to one son. She was invited by a friend to join the communal bank, and has been a member of FINCA Peru for over 12 years.

Rocío sells cosmetics, shoes and clothes from catalogues, and thanks to Finca Peru she has managed to grow her business. Now she not only sells from catalogues, she also distributes her products. She feels proud of her accomplishments. One of them is that her son finished high school, which is all thanks to the loans she has received. She says it feels good to be a member, because it helps her to improve her business and her family, and it has also taught her how to save and how to distribute her business.

The loan requested will be invested in the purchase of merchandise such as stockings, and clothing such as shoes and school uniforms.

loans.use: to purchase shoes and school uniforms for subsequent sale

loans.name: Yusra

texts.en: Yusra, a 57-year-old married woman, owns a store for selling food products that has been running for two years now. From this store, she is adding another source of income for her family besides her husband's retirement salary. Now Yusra wants to improve the store by adding more food products, so she can have more variety to serve her customers. For this, she has applied for a loan.

loans.use: to add more food products

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary is 38 years old and married with two children. She runs a grocery store to earn a living. She has been in the business for 19 years and describes her business environment as good because there is limited competition. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to save her income and hopes to be financially stable in the future. She has applied for 40,000 Kenya Shillings to buy potatoes, tomatoes, and onions.

loans.use: To buy potatoes, tomatoes, and onions

loans.name: Teodora

texts.es: Casimira es socia del Banco Comunal Magnolias, tiene 54 años, es socia de Finca Perú hace mas de 5 años, tiene 7 hijos, es socia por invitación de su sobrina, se dedica a la compra de mantas, pero también las elabora y vende, gracias a los préstamos recibidos pudo mejorar su negocio, empezó vendiendo solo en Huamanga y actualmente lleva su mercadería a Lima, también pudo sacar profesional a su hijo, que ahora se esta educando gracias a su negocio y a los ahorros que tiene y los prestamos que le dan con facilidad a bajos intereses, el préstamo que solicita ahora lo invertirá en elaboración de mantas.
texts.en: Teodora is a member of Magnolia Community Bank. She is 54 years old and has belonged to Kiva partner Finca Perú for more than five years. She has seven children. She joined the community bank after her niece invited her. She makes a living making, buying and selling blankets. Thanks to the loans she has received she has been able to improve her business. She started out selling only in Huamanga and now takes the products to Lima. She has also been able to see her youngest son go to school (police academy) thanks to the business and the money she has saved from the low-interest loans. She now is requesting this loan to invest in making blankets.

loans.use: to buy blankets wholesale.

loans.name: Alia

texts.en: Alia is a conservative person, so she has asked her son, Ibrahim, to take her place in the photo. She is a 61-year-old housewife who wants to help her sons start their business, so she decided to build a tent for selling fruits and vegetables on the side of the main road. She lets her son Ibrahim works at it. Up till today, he is working very well at it and is making good income from this business. Now Alia wants to expand and build more tents in a different place, so they can have a chain for the family to sell fruits and vegetables. For this, she has applied for a loan.

loans.use: to expand and build more fruits and vegetables tents in a different place

loans.name: Ann

texts.en:
Ann is a 34-year-old business lady. She is a single mother of two children, aged eight and six years respectively. She has been in a livestock trading business for the past three years with a monthly income of KES 11,000 which she uses to support her family.


She is applying for her first loan term from KADET LTD, after being introduced by a KADET staff member. Ann will use the loan to buy more livestock for sale.

With the anticipated profit from the business, she will educate her children. Her hopes and dreams are to buy a lorry (truck) for transporting her livestock to different markets.

loans.use: To buy more livestock for sale

loans.name: Tofaha

texts.en: Tofaha, a 43-year-old woman, is married to Ibrahim who works with the Jordanian military. They have six sons and daughters. Tofaha has owned a day care kindergarten for two years now. She wants to add a new room for older kids to prepare them before entering first grade at school. For this, she has applied for a loan.

loans.use: to add a new room to her day care

loans.name: Laureles Group

texts.es:
El grupo el laurel lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras una de ellas es María de Jesús quien se dedica al comercio de frutas desde hace 7 años; además lava ropa y plancha. Ella tiene cuatro hijos los cuales saco adelante y solo depende de ella el menor de 14 años quien va para ter ser año de secundaria.
Las otras integrantes son Ivania del Socorro  de 43 años quien tiene una pulpería y Vilma de 39 años quien vende desde pan, hueso, carne, tiste y pozol.
texts.en:
The group El Laurel is made up of 3 hard-working people.  One of them is María de Jesús who has been selling fruits for 7 years.  She also washes and irons clothing.  She has 4 children who she provided for.  Only her youngest, who is 14 and is going into his 3rd year of high school, is dependent on her.  

The other members are Ivania del Socorro who is 43 and has a small store and Vilma, who is 39 and sells bread, bones, meat, tiste, and pozol.

loans.use: purchase fruit that is in season.

loans.name: Munira

texts.ru: Мунира замужем и любящая мать троих детей. Она очень трудолюбивая и добросовестная женщина. Более 3 лет она занимается скотоводством. Имеет хорошие условия на содержание скота. В бизнесе помогают муж, сын и невестка. Мунира хотела бы получить займ в размере 10500 Сомони для покупки крупного рогатого скота и корма для них.
texts.en: Munira is married and the loving mother of three. She is a very hard-working and conscientious person. She has been  engaged in animal husbandry for over three years. She has good conditions for keeping livestock. Her husband, son and daughter-in-law help her in the business. Munira would like to obtain a loan in the amount of 10,500 TJS in order to buy cattle and feed.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Pridon

texts.en:
Pridon is 37 years old. He lives in the village Bobokvati, Seaside of Georgia. Pridon is married and lives with his family: wife Nunu, three children (16, 15 and 7 years old) and father. Pridon is a minibus driver, transporting passengers among the villages of the district. He is also involved in operating the family farm. They have 2 milk cows. Nunu produces cheese and sells it locally. Also the family owns 0.25 hectare land, where citrus and nuts are grown. Harvested citrus and nuts are sold locally. Total average monthly income of the family is 640 Laris. 

Pridon requested credit for purchasing feed for cows. Also, a small part of the credit will be used for repairing the minibus which is now broken. When cows are fed well, their milking capacity increases. The amount of sales and total income of the family will go up as well. Also, Pridon will be able to use his minibus again for transportation of passengers and earn planned profit. It will positively impact the living conditions of the family.

loans.use: to purchase food for cows and pay for repairing the minibus

loans.name: Augustus

texts.en: Augustus is 61 years old, married with five children. He runs a retail shop to earn a living. He has been in the business for 3 years and has employed one person. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to improve his living standards and hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for 20,000 Kenya Shillings to buy phone batteries and chargers.

loans.use: To buy phone batteries and chargers

loans.name: Fakhridin

texts.ru: Фахридин проживает в районе Шахритус. Ему 23 года. Он женат. Живет вместе с родителями. Его жена и отец работаю в дехканском хозяйстве. Сам Фахридин занимается выращиванием овощей. Этим видом деятельности он занимается два года. Кредит берет для закупа семян картошки и минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Fahridin lives in the Shahritus region. He is 23 years old and married. He lives with his parents. His wife and father work at the local farm. Fahridin himself grows vegetables, which he has been doing for two years. He requests a loan for the purchase of potato seed and fertilizers.

loans.use: For planting potatoes.

loans.name: Las Fresas Group

texts.es:
La señora Ana Luisa es uno de los integrantes del grupo Las Fresas el cual esta conformado por 13 mujeres alegres, amables y muy trabajadoras, cada una de ellas tiene una actividad economica la cual desempeñan para sacar adelante a sus familias, ellas son: Dominga venta de pollo, Martha venta de zapatos, Florinda venta de refrescos, arianna venta de pollo, alejandra venta de cosmeticos, lucero venta de dulces, Francisca venta de tacos, Norma venta de dulces, Floriberta venta de abarrotes, elizabeth dulceria, Nora venta de abarrotes,Ana Lucia refrescos.

La señora ana luisa tiene la edad de 46 años, estudios hasta el sexto grado de primaria y esta casada con el señor marco que trabaja como chofer, ellos tienen dos hijos los cuales asisten a la escuela.
